job_lists.title: PC Base軟體工程師
job_lists.company: 艾斯邁科技股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
工作內容：
台積電設備相關軟體開發
主要為負責 PC Base編寫控制程式以及協助與支援服務工程人員進行設備軟體調整或設定。
條件要求如下:
1.熟悉Visual C# .Net、VB .Net、C++ 程式語言者佳。
2.具自動控制設備及系統具有一定程度的瞭解者佳。
3.具機器視覺系統程式開發經驗者佳。
4.具思慮清晰可獨立工作，並有良好的團隊工作精神及溝通能力者佳。
5.可進行短期國內外出差。
6.具備汽、機車駕照。
福利與待遇:
1.週休二日，給薪年假、陪產假等等。
2.固定薪資12個月，年終獎金一個月。
3.獎金: 依據公司獲利程度、員工個人績效及目標達成率決定獎金發放金額。
4.勞保、健保。
5.員工聚餐。
6.薪資依工作經驗起薪，有機器視覺實務經驗者優先待優錄取。
job_lists.skills: 系統整合分析、軟體工程系統開發

job_lists.title: Senior FAE (Shanghai / Beijing)
job_lists.company: Marvell_邁威爾科技有限公司
job_lists.content:
FAE will assist the customer to understand and use Marvell storage devices in their products; with the goal to ultimately ensures successful production of customer drives using Marvell products. Typical activities include the following:
- Onsite customer support.
- Teach customers usage of Marvell SSD controllers.
- Help customer review/debug firmware to support Marvell SSD controllers.
- Support customer meetings and manage closure of action items.
- Become the central liaison between customer and Marvell design team: clearly understand and explain customer issues and requests to Marvell support team.
- Debug issues on the bench or customer site for host/drive compatibility issues.
- Create problem report and present to customers.
- Collect feature requests from customers to design team to improve product.
- Competitive analysis.
- Conducting tests and documenting results as required
job_lists.other_condition:
Previous FAE/firmware engineer background with 5+ years experience in HDD/SSD drive vendors or controller vendors is preferred. Good team player with strong technical background as listed in required skill part. Self-motivate and can work under stress to chase opportunity win. Good communication skills and can use English as working language fluently.

- Understanding of Embedded System Design and Firmware Development.
- Serial ATA Interface and PHY.
- PCIe interface. NVMe.  eMMC.
- NAND technology and interfaces.
- Direct customer management experience
- Knowledge of SSD system requirements, customers, operation, and hands-on PC, MAC or server systems debug skills.
- Understanding of key HW and SW trends within the Client or Server industry including form factors, power, performance, software applications preferred.
- General knowledge about ASIC design and manufacturing flow.

job_lists.title: 軟韌體工程師
job_lists.company: 欣擎科技股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
主要負責物聯網感測技術開發。
這個職位需要負責下列工作內容：
1. 產品軟韌體開發。
2. 產線測試校正軟體開發與佈建。
3. 演算法開發與驗證。
4. 持續了解客戶回饋與需求與持續改善。

工作上所需面臨的挑戰：
短期：深入了解產品屬性與領域特性，掌握無線感測器之核心技術，成功開發產品。
長期：持續擴展應用領域、關鍵技術建立、與持續創新與改善。

程式語言：
軟韌體工程師
-熟悉感測網路與系統。
-熟悉各種物連網架構與應用。
-熟悉雲端服務模式。
-有Bluetooth LE、Wi-Fi、Zigbee無線嵌入式系統開發量產經驗。
-有演算法開發與數位類比訊號處理基礎。
-程式語言：C/C++、Java Script
job_lists.skills: 網路資料傳輸、無線通訊技術開發、軟體程式設計、韌體程式設計、網路程式設計、新產品研發與測試
job_lists.other_condition:
需具備微處理器軟體開發經驗，歡迎應屆畢業生加入團隊 
人格特質：創新、樂觀積極、忠誠度高、Good Communication、精準的數字及邏輯觀念

job_lists.title: Sr. Software Application Engineer
job_lists.company: 澳洲商寬騰達通訊股份有限公司台灣分公司
job_lists.content:
Job Description and Responsibilities
• Work directly with customers to resolve/reproduce technical issues.
• Establish and maintain lines of communication with engineering and customer to discuss technical issues.
• Debug software issues such as bootloader, linux kernel and WLAN driver
• Evaluate Wi-Fi throughput, range and performance 
• Work with issues in Wi-Fi, IOT, Wi-Fi-Certification and Manufacturing.
• Customize software and drivers for customer’s platform.
• Software/driver integration for open source framework/platform ( Andriod/openWRT/RDK-B..)  
• Tools development to shorten customer support circle.
• Write technical application notes. Host technical training for internal FAE and external customers.
• Oversea travel is required to work with internal team or customers.

Skills & Qualifications
• Candidate should have 5-10 years of experience in software designing and supporting networking and wireless drivers
• Strong knowledge of Wi-Fi protocols and throughput analysis using tools – sniffers, spectrum analyzers,Chariot, iperf etc.
• Candidate should have solid experience in networking – L2 bridging, L3 routing, TCP/IP, UDP, IGMP, DHCP, NAT, VLAN.
• Candidate should have solid experience in analysing WIFI protocols - 802.11ac, WPS, WPA/WPA2 security, RADIUS, MESH.
• Candidate should have solid experience supporting u-boot/linux on embedded processor platforms.
• Strong problem solving skills. Strong customer facing experience 
• Strong written and oral communication skills. Good interpersonal skills.
• Video over Wi-Fi experience is preferable
• Reference Design Kit for Broadband devices (RDK-B) experience is preferable
• wireless mesh network (WMN) experience is preferable

Education and Experience
• Bachelor degree in EE or CS required. Masters preferred.
• At least 10 years of experience with at least 3-5 years in customer facing roles.

Candidate please send the English CV(resume) for job applying.

job_lists.title: NL-[CP質高公司] 照相機模組 Senior Software Engineer $1.3M~$1.5M
job_lists.company: 新加坡商立可人事顧問有限公司台灣分公司
job_lists.content:
Senior Software Engineer

1.熟手機SW, 但要有照相機模組的經驗，照相機模組占未來工作比重20%

2.能接受到中國出差

3.能以英文技術溝通

 

We’re looking for an experienced and self-motivated software project manager to join our team. The ideal candidate shall also have certain level of communication skills to work with teams located in different countries.

 

Job Description:

- Execute product software development with ODM SW teams through product lifecycle; from product design phase to mass production, maintenance releases, and to aftersales supporting.

- Ensuring software delivery on time with expected level of quality and required specifications.

- Continuously improving software performance and quality, by collecting lessons learnt and studying competitor and market pioneer products.

 

Main Roles and Responsibilities:

1. Product software requirement analysis and interpretation. Closely discuss with ODM teams and conduct feasibility study. Locking down software specifications for feature implementation. Set up correct expectation of feature complete stage internally.

2. Set up software milestones with ODM. Monitor and achieve them throughout product cycle.

3. Clarifying and prioritizing software issues and help ODM to resolve them effectively.

4. Provide ongoing software support post from ship acceptance and be the technical interface between the ODM partners and other groups within Bullitt Group.

5. Review the software capabilities of potential new ODM partners and provide reports and opinions on the risks and benefits of the potential partners.

 

Essential Skills and Experience:

- Software engineering experiences is a must. With strong knowledge of software development life cycle, software quality assurance and methodology.

- Better to have relative working experiences in and not limited to Android or Windows Mobile platform and involved in the whole product life cycle.

- Experiences on Camera HAL, 3A, image quality tuning is a PLUS.

- Good communication skill. Must demonstrate verbal and written skills to communicate effectively with cross functional teams including Product, Presale, Customer Service and management teams.

- Strong to fluent English writing and speaking ability. Capability of writing design documents.

- Experiences with ODM/OEM working model is a plus.

- Experiences with collaborating with different sites and time zones is a plus. 
 

CV to nicole@recruitexpress.com.tw

job_lists.title: MTS Firmware Engineer (BIOS Engineer)-Server
job_lists.company: 美商超微半導體股份有限公司台灣分公司
job_lists.content:
The requisition is for an MTS Firmware Engineer.  AMD’s Server team is looking for a dynamic, self-motivated, experienced BIOS engineer to develop platform BIOS solutions for AMD’s cutting edge server products.  The position entails architecting, coding, debugging, and documenting platform BIOS features with a goal of developing competitive and innovative reference design products for multiple internal and external customers, including software vendors, OEMs, and validation teams.    A successful candidate will employ solid software methodologies, firmware design expertise, deep technical knowledge, and well-honed organizational skills across multiple teams to ensure on-schedule, defect-free system firmware product development, reducing AMD’s time to market. A candidate must possess the technical proficiency and interpersonal confidence to technically clearly represent design ideas, complex problem descriptions and innovative solutions with other developers as well as non-firmware focused silicon teams.  
Skills: 
• In-depth UEFI BIOS development mandatory 
• C and ASM programming experience mandatory 
• Strong debug methodology and skills mandatory 
• Experience in server BIOS architecture mandatory 
• Experience in x86 architecture mandatory 
• Knowledge of server hardware interfaces (10G/1G Ethernet, SATA, AHCI, DDR3, PCIe Gen1/Gen2, SPI, I2C) expected 
• Intimate knowledge of software development process methodology expected 
• Knowledge of industry standard initiatives such as (ACPI, SMBIOS, PCIe) expected 
• Strong analytical skills and debug methodology expected  

Experience:  
• BSEE, BSCS, or BSCE degree or higher  
• 8 years of BIOS/firmware development required

job_lists.title: SSD HW Platform Firmware, Manager
job_lists.company: HGST昱科＿新加坡商昱科環球儲存股份有限公司 台灣分公司新竹營業所
job_lists.content:
Western Digital is seeking a platform firmware Manager to work in our Enterprise eSSD group. The manager will be responsible for:

Responsibilities:
• Leading a team chartered with platform diagnostic firmware development and execution. 
• Responsible for the specification, design, and implementation of platform diagnostic firmware for eSSD product. 
• Manages development diagnostic firmware activities, milestones, and deliverables.
• Manages, leads and develops people. Guides others toward shared goals, providing the development, coaching, feedback and resources to accomplish tasks.
• Co-works with the cross-functional team and helps to establish and maintain product diagnostic feature and timeline.

Requirements:
• BS/BA degree or equivalent with 12 or more years of related experience and 5 or more years of direct management experience.
• Ability to achieve results in a fast moving, dynamic environment.
• Excellent written and verbal communication skills, including ability to communicate effectively in English for firmware engineers and peer engineering teams and partners.
• strong ability to analyze complex firmware and hardware issues
• Ability to scope and estimate development effort.
• ASIC, Flash, SATA/SAS/PCIe experience with embedded architecture required
• Proficient and comfortable with standard software development methodologies including source control systems and defect tracking systems. 
• Over 8 years in C programming, exposure to C++ a plus and debug skills with tools such as JTAG debugger, GDB and protocol analyzer.

job_lists.title: SSD HW platform firmware Engineer, (Principle/Staff)
job_lists.company: HGST昱科＿新加坡商昱科環球儲存股份有限公司 台灣分公司新竹營業所
job_lists.content:
Job Description Summary
To develop the firmware and software to validate the SSD Product hardware meets the design specifications and performs the intended functions.

Job Description
Working as part of the HW platform firmware engineer, you will creates and maintains the diagnostic firmware running on high-performance controller for solid state memory systems. You will join all aspects of platform bring-up and development: Bring up boot-loader, DDR3/DDR4, ONFI/Toggle flash, diagnostic firmware and system level HAL firmware.

In this highly technical and hands-on role, essential duties and responsibilities include the following (other duties may be assigned):
• Interacting with hardware group, product verification group, product firmware group, VTA group and various other cross-functional teams.
• Design, write, debug, and integrate the high-performance SoC with firmware code across the SATA, SAS and PCIe/NVMe storage interface system.
• Involve in performing evaluating, designing, and building HAL code for high-performance solid-state system that will have the optimized hardware configuration setting, reduce power or latency and SoC complexity for the target markets.

Your contributions will have immediate contribution to the company success in our fast paced environment.
job_lists.other_condition:
QUALIFICATIONS:
Education Requirements

• The successful candidate will have an Electrical Engineering, Electrical and Computer Engineering, Computer Science, Math, or Physics (or a Masters in Electrical Engineering, Electrical and Computer Engineering, Computer Science, Math, or Physics). 3 or more years of experience working with embedded firmware, experience developing (design, implementation, debug) of code.

Required Skills/Experience

- Expert level in C programming.
- Two or more years experience with storage systems.
- Three years or more embedded firmware experience; including debugging using JTAG-based debuggers.
(* 7 years experience for Principle Engineer)
- Understanding of RISC microprocessors; including interrupts scheduling and optimization. Prior product development experience with at least two embedded microprocessors such as PowerPC, ARC, ARM, Tensillica, or equivalent.
- Demonstrated experience developing software using structured methodologies, including but not limited to: requirements analysis and capture, design documentation, source code management tools, and defect tracking tools.
- Good communication skills and ability to succinctly describe and summarize highly technical firmware and/or system challenges.
- Strong engineering aptitude for electronic/electrical systems, including ability to understand schematics as necessary for software/hardware integration.

Desired Skills/Experience
- Experience in storage systems and SSD
- Knowledge of memory controllers and memory systems (DDR3/4)
- Experience with Toggle or ONFI Flash memory technology
- Prior experience analyzing SATA,SAS or PCIe/NVMe protocols using corresponding protocol 
- Solid skills with one or more scripting language such as Perl.
- Experience with Linux and/or Windows drivers for storage products.

job_lists.title: IoT Wireless Embedded Software Engineer
job_lists.company: 馬來西亞商春迅股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
ADT (Advanced Development Team) 招募熟悉 BLE/WiFi 或其他無線技術 (e.g., Zigbee, Thread) 的軟體人才加入，如果您對 IoT (Internet of Things) 有熱情，有能力或有強烈意願學習將 IoT 相關技術應用在消費性電子產品或專業感應器和照明產業，為客戶創造新的價值，歡迎您來聊聊。

工作條件：
1. 熟悉 Bluetooth 4.0+ (Bluetooth Low Energy)，瞭解 Protocol 架構，知道 L2CAP, ATT, SM, GAP, GATT 及其應用。有一年以上的 BLE 相關 programming 經驗為佳。
2. 有 8-bit/16-bit/8051/ARM based MCU programming and debug 經驗。
3. 有 ADC, GPIO, I2C, SPI, Timer, Flash R/W 等周邊控制相關經驗任兩種。
4. 熟悉至少一種高階語言 (e.g., C語言)。
5. 有能力閱讀硬體 datasheet ，並分析和制定所需的軟硬體溝通介面。
6. 需與 EE 和 RF 工程師溝通，完成專案需求。
7. 對通訊技術和程式設計有熱情，會主動學習，能快速吸收新知，有能力將零散的資訊整理成有用的知識。
8. 樂於分享。
9. 對品質有堅持。
10. (Optional) 有 RTOS 或 Linux 系統程式設計經驗
11. (Optional) 有 PIR Sensor, Lighting Control 相關開發設計經驗
12. (Optional) 有 DALI, KNX 或其他 bus system 相關開發設計經驗
13. (Optional) 有 802.11 WiFi 相關開發設計經驗
job_lists.other_condition: 如有相關證照，Hackathon 競賽參賽或得獎經驗，請與履歷一併附上參考。

job_lists.title: Software Engineer (Microservices and API)
job_lists.company: 摩速科技有限公司
job_lists.content:
We are looking for a engineer to join our billing team; an energetic team focused on finding robust, pragmatic and elegant solutions to difficult problems. You will work on management a range of transactional microservices.

Our tech stack is a modern microservice architecture. Technologies we use include Docker, Go (golang), PostgreSQL, Redis, Nginx and the usual Unix/Linux tools and workflows. We strive to build reliable, fault tolerant systems that can operate at mlytics.

●5+ years professional experience as a developer/engineer
●Are experienced with designing, consuming, or implementing RESTful services
●Experience with API tooling and standards (Swagger/OpenAPI, OAuth/JWT)
●Experience with modern Unix/Linux development and runtime environments
●Strong interpersonal and communication skills with a bias towards action
●Have significant experience designing, coding, and implementing applications from the datastore to the public interface
●Have used statically typed languages such as Golang is a good plus
●Are passionate about writing reusable code that empowers other developers to work faster and smarter
●Experience working with a GLNP (Go, Linux, Nginx, PostgreSQL) stack
●Experience with key-value data stores (Redis, HBase, HDFS, or other)

job_lists.title: 軟體應用工程師
job_lists.company: 南京資訊股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
本團隊專注於商店（餐飲、零售）所需的營運、財務、管理軟體開發，並結合本公司既有硬體設計、製造專長，企望爲各型態商店提供完整資訊系統解決方案，成為商家得力助手。目前在台灣已有數間連鎖店客戶，產品正日益健全壯大，發展前景可期。

工作內容涵括：
＊開發門店前、後台，以及連鎖總店管理系統
＊依據使用者需求作系統分析，並進行程式架構設計
＊程式設計活用MVC、Design Pattern概念
＊開發工具以C# .Net、SQL為主，也正規劃Android、iOS APP開發
＊使用者圖形介面UI/UX搭配
＊研發雲端、資訊安全、統計相關應用

本團隊極具軟體開發熱情，樂於學習、嘗試創新技術。對於程式開發並不滿足於＂完成需求就好＂，而是力求架構的合理性、擴充性、穩定度，並且以自己的產品為傲。另外，部門氣氛和諧，不分資歷深淺皆樂於交流分享，意見想法會被充分尊重。

如果您認同這是一個有理想、值得共同打拼、能使您＂向上提昇＂的團隊，歡迎來面談，讓我們雙方有彼此了解的機會。
job_lists.other_condition:
本團隊軟體產品包含［本機端］及［Web端］，應徵者需具備兩者其中之一的相關技能，分別敘述如下：

［本機端］
＊熟悉C#及SQL
＊不會C#、但熟悉Java，也歡迎面談，但必須具備3年以上相關工作經驗
［Web端］
＊熟悉HTML、Java Script（jQuery）、ASP .Net、MVC、SQL

除了基本程式技能，本團隊也相當注重＂工作態度＂：

＊對軟體程式開發具熱情，平時即熱愛吸收相關技術新知（這就是本團隊的工作氣氛！）
＊對於程式開發不僅僅滿足於功能完成就好，而是能自我要求 ＂架構做得對、做得好＂
 （這也是本團 隊的期許目標！）
＊願意分享開發心得，與團隊共同成長（這就是本團隊的特質，同仁不論資歷深淺都樂於主動交
    流）

另外，如果同時具備以下任一能力則更佳：

＊應用軟體系統分析（SA）、系統設計（SD）實務經驗
＊物件導向、設計模式（Design Pattern）、MVC經驗、UML分析
＊能同時處裡多個交付任務，應付產品多樣性 
＊軟體測試概念、方法，自動測試建置經驗
＊熟悉餐飲、量販營運模式，或ERP、CRM、進銷存軟體使用經驗
＊CMMI、Agile（Scrum）軟體開發流程實務經驗
＊Android或iOS APP開發經驗（3年以上）
＊SOA架構概念、JSON
＊雲端server建置
＊資訊安全

job_lists.title: 【CD00-06151】車用軟體開發工程師
job_lists.company: 亞旭電腦股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
We are looking for a full time Software Engineer who is interested in the embedded software to create and produce automotive product at Askey Computer Corp. In this role, you will be responsible for developing Android-based system software for Automotive solution. The system software may include firmware in IC, Linux kernel, device driver, hardware abstract layer, Android framework, and sometimes application for test/debug purpose. You will work closely with chip vendors and hardware (EE) engineers to build stable, high performance, and reliable platforms for the automotive product development. The ability of effective bug analysis, issue tracking, problem solving, and communication skills are highly demanded in this position. In our team, we will expect you to have a more perspective view to the entire software system and develop software modules to fulfill the requirements of product functionalities. 

Other essential functions include
 Reviews product requirement and software architecture
 Participates in the design and review of software specification
 Works with chip vendors and hardware engineers to build functionalities in BSP
 Performs root cause analysis and outlines corrective action for given problems
 Provides reliable solutions to a variety of problems
 Collaborates and adds value through providing comments in participation of peer code reviews
job_lists.other_condition:
 Solid foundation in software engineering
 Experience developing Linux kernel and device driver
 Experience developing Android-based embedded system
 Experience developing embedded system on Qualcomm Soc is preferable
 Experience in industrial interface standards such as UART, RS232, RS485, CAN, LIN, USB, I2C, I2S, MIPI SLIMBus, MIPI DSI, MIPI CSI, …etc

job_lists.title: 【日本工作】ハードウェア．家電関連　組み込み制御エンジニア＊skype面試即可 J21
job_lists.company: 立樂高園股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
■面試地點 ：台灣/台北
■面試時間 ：7/15（六）
■雇用形態　：正式雇用（正社員）

■設施．職場環境
公司與製造商一同實踐能安心工作的職場環境。
作為主導企業，為了提高業界價值，並且提供工程師多樣選擇且安心工作的環境，敝司正致力於各式各樣的努力，例如：承包、委託的強化。

藉由以上努力，根本改善收益構造達到整體薪資向上，提供工程師們可以安定磨練自己長處的環境。目前敝司53歲負責統籌計畫的現役工程師也稱讚敝司是「可以一輩子努力專研技術的地方」。為了今後也能領先業界，目前我們仍持續展開各項新的挑戰。

■工作內容
　前往敝司超過700家上市公司的客戶方，作為敝司的正社員參與產品開發計畫以及設計計畫。並且會讓您負責機械、電器電子、情報以及嵌入式控制系統等各個不同領域的設計開發。
　由於負責業務70%以上皆為各計畫的初階工程，如能同時活用敝司分析技術重要性、難易度以及時代需求度後製作出來的技術戰略地圖等特長，定能成為市場價值高的工程師。
　另外，進入公司後，除了新人研修外以及後續支援研修外，亦有經驗豐富的工程師出身訓練專員、前輩工程師指導職務能力向上的支援制度（Career Design Advisor制度），以細心的支援體系持續支持我們的社員。

＜敝司特別致力於的5個領域＞ 
■3次元設計技術 　■嵌入式系統軟體技術 　■CAE技術 　■逆變器技術 　■高頻電路技術

■需求條件:
【必要條件】
對於最前端的技術擁有誠懇並且高度的求知慾，並且願意面對自身未來的人。
從事過家電、汽車、輸送機械的嵌入式系統、控制系統相關開發的求職者。
★不限領域以及年資

【次要條件】
■C、C++、組合語言（assembly language）等的嵌入式控制系統開發經驗
■家電等微電腦控制系統開發經驗
■架設網站、建構網路、資料庫程式設計經驗 
■系統檢測除錯經驗

■語言程度要求
・N3以上。（可以用日語溝通無礙的程度）
■年收
4,000,000～7,000,000日幣（因經驗而不同）
■月薪制：22萬日幣~40萬日幣/月
※依能力、經驗而定，待遇優

■調薪：1年1次
■獎金：1年2次
■待遇/ 各項福利:
◆雇用型態：正式雇用(正社員)
◆各項補助：交通費全額支付　　　　
◆假日、休假：
週休二日(六日以及國定假日※有國定假日時，該週六需上班）、年底假期、夏日假期、年假、婚喪特別假、特別假
年度假日共計123日(含特別假)

◆各項保險：健康保險、雇用保險、勞災保險、年金提撥
◆待遇福利：
薪水自動扣存制度
轉職赴任臨時補助金
返鄉旅費補助
宿舍・社有住宅制度
※1個月2~3萬日幣+水電瓦斯費用個人負擔
搬家費用補助
TechnoPro 從業員持股會（有獎勵金）

job_lists.title: 業務支援類 - Sr. FAE, virtual prototyping (竹北)
job_lists.company: Synopsys Taiwan Co., Ltd._台灣新思科技股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
This position is in the Virtual Prototyping group of Synopsys is focused on pre-sales & deployment of industry leading solutions for SoC architecture design and embedded software development. 

The FAE is expected to tightly collaborate with Sales and interact with customers; Typical technical sales activities includes technical discovery meetings, analysis of customers’ prototyping requirements, identification of customer specific value of a Synopsys solution, product demonstrations, solution presentations, evaluations and benchmarking.

The FAE is also responsible for deployment activities including product training, support for general product usage, technical issue resolution and managing and tracking issues reported by customer. The FAE will sometimes be involved in creation of statements of work, oversee specification and /or implementation of customized prototyping environments, and perform proof-of-concept modeling and library development.

In addition, the FAE will provide field input to engineering and marketing for product development, promote Synopsys technology in trade shows and continuously seek to update their knowledge and understanding of Synopsys Virtual Prototyping solutions, relevant markets and technologies.

keywords: SystemC; ARM processors; Carbon; Carbon SoC Designer; Simics; Arteris; Sonics; Gem5; ESL; TLM
job_lists.other_condition:
Minimum qualifications include BS (MS preferred) in EE or CS and 3+ years experience in a customer facing role related to SoC design, IP Deployment and/or embedded software development. 

Candidates must have proficiency in C/C++ programming on Unix or Windows, knowledge of SOC architectures and software development tools, familiarity with overall design flow and tools. 

Candidates must be independent and proactive, possess strong communication skills, and have the ability to learn quickly. The role requires travel (about 25% of the time).

Desired qualifications include 3+ years EDA/Hardware IP/Embedded Software industry experience including experience in an FAE role. Experience with ARM processors, SystemC, embedded software development or systems engineering is a strong plus.

資工/資管/電子/電機/電信/通訊/電控相關研究所背景，對行動通訊、無線及寛頻連結、家庭娛樂晶片解決方案有濃厚興趣的研發替代役。

本公司韌體研發工程師職務包含：
1. 相關產品之韌體程式設計與驗證。
2. 協助硬體驗證與解決問題。

3. 能看懂 MCU 電路圖

Responsibilities:
•Independently analyze, evaluates and applies standard embedded firmware design and development standards and practices and applies it to design and develop a medical device/product or enhance an existing one.
•Generate complete, concise documentation in order that design may be correctly and accurately fabricated by vendors, received by incoming inspection, and assembled by production personnel. 
•Design and develop an optimal code in C to control and monitor device/product functions including error checking and reporting.
•Create clear, concise firmware/software documentation, including design specifications, detail design, code related documents, and tests plans.
job_lists.skills: 韌體工程開發、韌體整合測試、韌體程式設計、PCB樣品測試檢驗

job_lists.company: 香港商陽碩利華有限公司台灣分公司
job_lists.content:
香港商陽碩利華公司台灣分公司主要為專業設計、研發及生產輔助性醫療器材設備，如磨指甲機、牙醫床設備, 皮膚照護及外科手術儀器等等。

本公司電子工程師職務包含：
1. 電子電路設計 與 PCB Layout 
2. 協助解決軟體，韌體問題。
3. 安全規格設計要求評估與分析。
2. 新產品專案開發, 系統效能分析 
3. 建立相關產品之EE BOM, 規格書及測試標準與報告。
4. 設計測試治具設備供生產測試使用， 建立產品檢驗標準規範給品管部門執行品質控管。
5. 具備獨立完成專案研發設計的能力。


歡迎青年男女，對電子產品開發設計有興趣者，加入我們的行列。
Responsibilities:
•Independently analyze, evaluates and applies standard embedded hardware and firmware design and development standards and practices and applies it to design and develop a medical device/product or enhance an existing one.
•Generate complete, concise documentation in order that design may be correctly and accurately fabricated by vendors, received by incoming inspection, and assembled by production personnel.
job_lists.other_condition:
1. 對電子產品開發設計有興趣者, 有心想成為專業的研發工程師或朝此方向發展
2. 與 R/D Team 協力完成產品專案 (團隊合作及協調性佳)
3. 英文聽說讀寫 程度中上, 具備基本英文溝通能力者佳
4. 細心、負責、 獨立、 擅於思考、邏輯佳
5. 具ISO-13485,IEC60601及IEC62304 相關經驗者佳
6. 具Microcontroller軟體程式相關經驗者佳 - 如Microchip及其他單晶片

Required Skills and Qualifications:
•A degree in Electronics or electrical engineering or Masters degree in related discipline of software/firmware development with emphasis on embedded system and medical devices
•3 to 5 years of experience in electronic circuit design both analog and digital for medical device as well as writing embedded firmware/software for them
•Ability to analyze physical systems and apply engineering knowledge of Electronics design principles and functions in creating specifying product design, drawings and software/firmware codes.
•Ability to generate clear, complete, concise design documentation including design specifications, fabrication and assembly drawings, in order that design may be correctly and accurately fabricated by vendors, received by incoming inspection, and assembled by production personnel.
•Preferred Experience
•Knowledge and experience of popular Computer Aided Design Software for the electronic industry
•Knowledge and experience of Integrated Development Environment (IDE) for development and debugging of Microchip software/firmware
•Knowledge with design of medical devices using Microcontroller is a plus.
•Knowledge with assembly or C/C++ languages programming is a plus.

job_lists.title: Manufacturing Test Engineer
job_lists.company: 台灣耐格如信有限公司
job_lists.content:
Mission : You are part of our Global Supply Chain and Operations department, more particularly, within a Manufacturing team, you are responsible of the development of the Test tools and SW for Manufacturing.


Responsability :

- As Production Test engineer, you are in charge to develop the test solution for factory testing.. Design, develop, install and maintain the hardware and software that are needed to insure  the quality of SmarDTV products manufacturing. 
- You will work in international environment, so you must be autonomous and rigorous. You will report to European Manager and other Team member, but also to others members of the organization (Project Team, NPI Team, etc…) based in Europe but also locally.
o 1st Step, the job consist mainly to develop and maintain the test tools (production software) according to requirement, Production software can be Embedded or on OS (from driver to user interface). You wrote the related documentation in English (Technical document, user guide, Test and Production instruction) in international environment, following the Manufacturing Test team rules.
o Then, 2nd step, you will have the responsibility of the product Test Solution along the product life for both Hardware and Software aspects (Firmware, PC application, JIG, data-base, test equipment, electrical measure, functional test, personalization…). The job consist to define and review the test strategy, test coverage and DFT rules, select, buy and integrate the equipments, development of the Software, integrate the tools, realize unitary test of software functionalities, define the VTP, execute VTR, and as part of the job : install, validate and follow the introduction in production during ramp-up phase till end of production).
Coordinate with the NPI Manager, you will drive the planning of Test development with the Manufacturing Test Team in order to meet the gate and dead-line of the project during the ramp-up phase. 
- Then along the mass-production, you will follow with Manufacturing Support Team and suppliers the Test issue encountered and maintain the tools in production, participate actively to improvement.
- A part of the Manufacturing team, you will be involved on dedicated project of continuous improvement and multi-sites environment, following the standard (ISO, …).



Profile :
•  Engineer, you can justify of 5 years’ experience minimum in the in the Software development, low level, PC application, in the sector of test for production and ideally in the STB/TV business
• Creativity, ability to provide the best effective software solution
• Language : C, C++, C#, TCL, 
• Hardware skills: Being autonomous and comfortable in debugging, analog/digital interfaces, Measurement tooling (scope, analyzer, voltmeter…), integration HW/SW, track and solve issues.
• Data-base management  : BDD, SQL, 
• OS: Windows, Linux.
• Configuration Manager : SVN
• Bug tracker : JIRA
• Some experience of the Manufacturing will be helpful.
• Previous experience with Pxi system (National Instrument and Pickering equipment) will be appreciated.
•  You are autonomous, have good methodology, rigorous with high expectation and implication (result, customer and quality oriented...). 
• Team spirit working in international environment.
• English fluent (daily work, reporting, audio call, etc...)
• Travel in china (mainly), Singapore, Malaysia (occasional)

job_lists.title: 新大軟體研發工程師
job_lists.company: TTI_智同科技股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
我們希望能有一些剛畢業的有志青年加入我們的軟體開發工作，雖然不需要工作經驗，但是希望程式語言(特別是C語言)要強，對於作業系統有一定的。

由於公司內的軟體開發，種類繁多，工作與專長各有有不同，希望應徵者，能看一下這些工作的程式語言專長，在應徵時，說明有興趣的主題。如果有機會面談，再決定適合哪項工作? 
1. Server端的程式，程式語言的使用包含C# 與 PHP，此外也要會DHTML/JavaScript。
2. Linux平台: 就是用C語言寫程式。
3. Apps: Android (Java), iOS(Objective-C), Windows APPS (DHTML, C#)。
job_lists.other_condition:
這個職缺主要是開放給剛剛由學校畢業的同學，是要以寫程式為短期發展目標的求職者應徵。
本工作錄取之後，需要依照工作表現與學習進度，試用三至一年。完成試用後，會重新敘薪。

job_lists.title: Linux 與 Android TV 平台軟體研發工程師
job_lists.company: TTI_智同科技股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
負責平台軟體的移植與開發工作
1.依照硬體規格，安裝Bootloader，啟動作業系統到Set-top Box板子上。
2.移植Linux, Android TV 6.x 與 RDK 平台軟體到Set-top Box上。
3.移植OPEN SOURCE的軟體到Set-top Box上。
4.對於移植結果進行功能驗證與簡單的修改。
5.Release 軟體給其他部門，並協助解決問題。
6.必要的時候提供與硬體相關的底層程式(HAL) API給Android上層呼叫。
7.Linux Kernel與runtime環境做最佳化處理，以節省記憶體與儲存空間。
8.由於產品賣到國外去，需要與外國公司或客戶協同工作，所以基本英文能力需要具備。
9.必要時支援產品的測試程式的開發。
10.支援DirectFB, QT, Gstreamer, Webkit的移植。
11. PlayReady/Widvine DRM的Enable。
12.針對本公司硬體產品，提供SDK給客戶進行軟體開發。
job_lists.other_condition:
此工作仍然需要精通C 語言，需要進行簡單的考試(但用OPEN BOOK)，要考60分(總分100分)，才會進行面試。
本工作錄取之後，需要試用三至六個月，試用完成，會依照試用期表現，重新敘薪。

job_lists.company: TTI_智同科技股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
有應徵者面談時問我，不是外銷業務才要出國嗎? 軟體工程師也要出國? 沒錯，這工作由於常要與國外客戶的Partners合作開發軟體，所以出國去駐點整合程式與解決BUG，成為常態性的工作。但也不是會寫程式就能去，會要講點技術英文，要寫點英文文件，英文還在學習階段的，就只能在需要帶助手的時候跟者去。不過出國工作也很辛苦的，別人童常在等你的工作結果，還要一天當兩天用來工作，外國人放假的時候，你還要辛苦地去考察當地風土人情。

主要於Linux平台，開發IPTV/VOD/DLNA的相關軟體API硬體或作業系統層的服務，這些API將提供給STB上層軟體使用，這工作將會學習到:
- Linuxl核心系統架構與SYSTEM CALL的使用。
- 高階程式語言技巧。
- Video and Audio decoding (包含H.264, HEVC, Dolby Digital 等解碼技術)。
- Recording, Time-Shift, Place-shift等等專業程式控制技巧。
- CAS/DRM design (2048 bit HIGH-SECURITY, RSA, PKI, etc)
- Graphics (2D/3D)
- Networking (Wi-Fi, LTE, Bluetooth, NFC, Power line, ...)
- Others

使用Linux開發環境，主要程式語言為C，會C++更好。

產品的使用者目前是國內外各大電信公司，同時與國外軟體大廠合作，因此工作上常會有與外國客戶溝通的必要性，良好的英文能力有助於此工作的發揮。如果語言與專業能力OK，也會依專案需要派駐國外與客戶一起工作的機會。
job_lists.other_condition:
此工作需要精通C 語言，熟Linux，但無法接受，您進來了才開始學基本的C，所以要進行簡單的C語言筆試(筆試是採用OPEN BOOK，請攜帶常用的C語言教材、課本或筆記做為參考)，要考60分以上，才會安排主管面談。如果對於C語言一無所知，或只有看看書，沒有寫過程式，建議不要來試驗。未來工作的時候，C++要能看得懂。
本工作錄取之後，需要試用三至六個月，同仁於轉為正式員工時，會依照試用期表現，重新敘薪。

job_lists.title: 嵌入式韌體工程師
job_lists.company: 嚮樂科技股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
工作內容:

本工作將有機會接觸到各式以 ARM Linux 爲基礎的工控產品, 從 L2/L3 switch 到 WLAN AP,  
上面搭載各式最新工控規格ex. IEEE 1588, IEC-62439, 你將有機會與硬體工程師以及 protocol developer 協同合作, 將功能整合進實際產品. 

你將被賦予主要工作

* 整合合校調 linux system, 從 kernel 到所有 user space 程式.
* 規劃與整合 filesystem image, 決定置入或移除元件.
* 驗證新製硬體.
* 測試與編譯 3rd party or open source 軟體.
* 分析系統資源與加強系統穩定性與效率. 


應徵條件:
* 精通熟練 C programming
* 熟悉 UNIX 操作與 shell script
* 熟悉 Embedded linux 常見子系統 MTD, uboot, squashfs, I2C, SPI, GPIO 等等
* 有能力自行 build Linux kernel and filesystem image
* 有能力自行 cross-compile linux driver 以及 user space application

加分項目:
* 有 github 帳號與活躍專案可供參考
* 曾修改過 opensource 軟體符合客制需求.(請詳列名稱與修改內容)
* 任何單晶片(uCon) programming經驗.
* 精通熟悉 OpenWRT 先進功能 ex. VPN or Captive portal, 瞭解如何以UCI 設定, 以及該功能底層所使用的元件.

能快速學習並運用新技術者尤佳

job_lists.title: FPGA電源控制工程師/6150(林口)
job_lists.company: 致茂電子股份有限公司
job_lists.content: 你是否厭倦了一成不變的產品開發工作?  對於技術的停滯感到不安?創新技術研發中心集結了光學、機構、電力電子、類比、數位、演算法、韌體、熱流…等各領域菁英，持續關注業界新趨勢的脈動並專注於前瞻性核心技術的研究，以促成公司發展具精準、可靠、獨特性的世界級產品。在這裡我們常和各領域高手一起腦力激盪，既發揮長才更同時拓展橫向知識，也可透過產學研合作與外部各領域專家密集互動，更可感受到同僚間相互尊重、關心、協助與分享。如果你熱愛研發工作，喜歡創新求變，無畏技術研究的挑戰，歡迎一起加入我們的行列。具體工作內容如下:數位儀器電源技術研究_透過FPGA進行數位控制，提升數位儀器電源之效能，應用於綠能產業之電源測試1.Verilog HDL 設計2.電源數位控制系統架構規劃
job_lists.other_condition: FPGA開發經驗2年以上具電力電子、數位控制相關背景尤佳，或具學習熱忱者亦可

job_lists.title: 資深軟體工程師 (Senior Software Engineer)
job_lists.company: 美商_睿科網路科技有限公司
job_lists.content:
Job Description
As a Senior Software Engineer, you will contribute to the advancement of A10 Networks award winning products.  Your responsibilities include designing and enhancing network applications, and providing high quality software implementations.  You will participate in design, code and test plan reviews and interact with cross functional teams.  Part of the job may involve providing assistance to technical support teams on an as needed basis.  Investigation, research and proof of concept projects will also be part of your responsibilities.

Required Qualifications
• Minimum 5 years of experience developing software for network applications
• Strong C/C++ programming skills and hands-on development experience using Linux 
• Experience in multi-threading, multi-core, and real-time high availability embedded systems
• Direct work experience with one of the security technologies: UTM/DCFW, Load Balance, (DPI)Deep Packet Inspection, QoS, WAN optimization, VPN, Firewall, IPS/IDS, or NAT
• Expert at TCP/IP and knowledgeable with common standard protocols such as DNS, HTTP/HTTPS, SSL, ALG, IPsec, AAA(Authentication, Authorization, Accounting), etc.
• Experience programming with one scripting language: shell, perl, python, etc.
• Solid foundation of Layer 2 switching, Layer 3 IP forwarding and routing
• Basic English proficiency in reading, writing, speaking and comprehension
• Bachelor's degrees in computer science, engineering, physics, or math

Preferred Qualifications
• Knowledge of networking security
• Experience programming for high scalability and performance
• Experience with high availability concepts and protocols
• Masters or PhD in computer science, engineering, physics, or math

工作說明
你將擔任資深網路軟體工程師，並加入睿科網路公司的高效能產品開發團隊。
你的責任包括設計、編寫網路應用軟體，以及提高軟體品質。
你會參與跨團隊之 設計，編碼和測試計劃。
如有需要，適時提供睿科技術團隊專業上之援助。
創新技術的調查，研究和實證。

基本須具備以下能力
• 至少五年以上網路相關之軟體開發經驗
• Linux 環境中 C / C++ 程式語言之實作經驗
• 多線程，多核心，即時嵌入式系統, 高容錯系統的經驗
• 至少一種 script 語言的編程經驗，如shell script ，PERL，Python等
• 熟悉網路第2層交換，第3層IP轉發和路由運作
• 深入了解IP網絡和通訊協議， 如TCP/ IP，DNS, HTTP/HTTPS, SSL等
• 具備下列專業技能(至少一項)：UTM/DCFW，系統負載平衡(Load Balance)，深度 IP 封包檢測(DPI)，QoS ，廣域網優化，VPN，防火牆，IPS / IDS，NAT，IPsec或AAA等
• 基本英文能力
• 至少物理，計算機科學，工程或數學的學士學位

具備以下能力尤佳
• 網路安全的知識
• 開發高擴充性和高效能的程式經驗
• 高容錯實作經驗與概念
• 具備物理，計算機科學，工程或數學的碩士或博士學位

About A10 Networks
A10 Networks is a fast growing expansion-stage startup renowned for its technology innovation and leadership in Web Application Delivery appliances. Since the time AX Series was introduced in 2007, we have won three years of The Best of Show at Interop, with many marquee customers worldwide.
Our customers include the top Web Portal providers, top online retailers, top cable operators and many leading enterprises. We have immediate needs to fill 10 job openings in Software Engineering and Quality Assurance (QA) to achieve our hefty goals. All North American positions are based in San Jose, California.
A10 Networks is one of the Top Workplaces in the Bay Area region for two consecutive years, as honored by the San Jose Mercury News. A10 is a promising startup based in Silicon Valley that offers competitive compensation packages and great career opportunities. A10 Networks is an equal opportunity employer M/F/V/D.

關於 美商A10 Networks (美商睿科網路)

A10 Networks (睿科網路) 創立於美國加州矽谷，是一個發展快速、擁有創新技術和引領應用網路科技的公司。 自 2007年推出我們的旗艦 AX系列，連續三年贏得了國際最大Interop展會最佳產品獎，以及許多全球重要客戶的肯定，更受到積極發展雲端科技的臺灣重視與肯定，中華民國經濟部更進一步邀請 A10 Networks至臺灣設立研發中心。
我們以在台北地區建立一個全新的研發中心，並極招募台灣的頂尖人才加入我們的行列。 A10 Networks (睿科網路)不但連續兩年被美國聖荷西水星報譽為矽谷最佳工作場所之一，也是同類產業中成長最快速的公司，在2010年亦獲得全美成長最快之非上市公司 Inc. 500年度排行第46名，這份名單針對目前美國重要經濟來源---美國獨立企業，進行了最詳細及全面性的研究。像Microsoft、American Apparel、Oracle等其他知名企業早期皆藉由進入Inc. 500的排名而受到了關注。同時還榮獲”電腦硬體公司”第二名及”聖荷西當地公司”第二名，A10 Networks創始人兼首席執行長陳澧更成為台灣第一位獲得”最佳亞州經營者公司”第一名的殊榮。

job_lists.company: 美商_睿科網路科技有限公司
job_lists.content:
Job Description
As a Software Engineer in networking, you will contribute to the advancement of A10 Networks award winning products.  Your responsibilities include designing and enhancing network applications, and providing high quality software implementations.  You will participate in design, code and test plan reviews and interact with cross functional teams.  Part of the job may involve providing assistance to technical support teams on an as needed basis.  

Required Qualifications
• Minimum 2 years of experience developing software for network applications or protocols
• Strong C programming skills and hands-on development experience using Linux 
• Solid foundation of Layer 2 switching, Layer 3 IP forwarding and routing
• Strong IP networking skills and experience with some protocols such as TCP/IP, HTTP, DNS, DHCP, NTP, SNMP, GRE, etc.
• Experience in multi-threading, multi-core, and real-time high availability embedded systems
• Experience programming with one scripting language: shell, perl, tcl, python, etc.
• Basic English proficiency in reading, writing, speaking and comprehension
• Bachelor's degrees in computer science, engineering, physics, or math

Preferred Qualifications
• Knowledge of IPv6
• Experience with application protocols for Peer to Peer, Instant Messaging or Video Streaming
• Experience with database systems and programming
• Experience programming for high scalability and performance
• Experience with high availability concepts for networking devices
• Direct work experience with one of the technologies: Load balance, deep packet inspection, QoS, WAN optimization, VPN, firewall, IPS/IDS, AV, NAT, or Compression
• Masters or PhD in computer science, engineering, physics, or math

工作說明
你將擔任網路軟體工程師，並加入睿科網路公司的高效能產品開發團隊。

你會參與跨團隊之 設計，編碼和測試計劃。
如有需要，適時提供睿科技術團隊專業上之援助。

基本須具備以下能力
• 至少兩年以上網路相關之軟體開發經驗
• Linux 環境中 C程式語言之實作經驗
• 熟悉網路第2層交換，第3層IP轉發和路由運作
• 深入了解IP網絡和通訊協議， 如TCP/ IP，HTTP，DNS，DHCP，NTP，SNMP，GRE等
• 多線程，多核心，即時嵌入式系統, 高容錯系統的經驗
• 至少一種 script 語言的編程經驗，如shell script ，PERL，TCL，Python等
• 基本英文能力
• 至少物理，計算機科學，工程或數學的學士學位

具備以下能力尤佳
• IPv6的知識
• P2P 應用協議，即時通訊軟體或視訊應用
• 資料庫系統和開發實作經驗
• 開發高擴充性和高效能的程式經驗
• 高容錯實作經驗與概念
• 具備下列專業技能(至少一項)：系統負載平衡，深度 IP 封包檢測，QoS ，廣域網優化，VPN，防火牆，IPS / IDS，防毒，NAT或 資料壓縮
• 具備物理，計算機科學，工程或數學的碩士或博士學位

job_lists.title: JAVA Card 軟體開發工程師
job_lists.company: 太思科技股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
POSITION OVERVIEW:
Taisys software engineers develop the next-generation technologies that change millions of users to interact with information and people in a high level of security mobile environment. We're looking for engineers who bring fresh ideas from all areas, including global standard mobile banking/payment covering credit/debit contact/contactless , and SIM/embedded SIM of Telco Applications, etc. 
As a software engineer, you will work on a specific project critical to Taisys needs in our fast-paced business growing and evolving. We need our engineers to be smart, versatile, display leadership of qualities and be enthusiastic to take on new problems across the full-stack as we continue to push technology forward.
In this role, you will be in charge of Java card applet design and development. You will be working on new firmware development, configuration management, certificate, and performance improvement. 
RESPONSIBILITY：
1. Design and implement firmware for smart card systems.
2. Design and implement tools for system bring-up, debugging, and performance/power evaluation.

MUST Qualifications
1. BS/MS degree in EE/CS or relevant technical field 
2. 3 years equivalent practical experience.
3. Strong ability and experience in C , Java programming skills
4.     Able to read specs in English
5.     Eager to study new technology
6.     Self motivation and creative.
job_lists.other_condition:
Plus skills:
1. The experience of Java card applet programming will be a plus.
2. Working experience in mobile device sector
4. Experience in Payment Java Applet – PBOC/MChip Mobile sector.
5. Familiar with Message Security mechanism.

job_lists.content:
【公司概要】
總公司成立於日本崎玉縣，是一間經營電腦繪圖用的液晶面板或觸控筆相關的硬體、軟體等的製造商。
在業界當中有相當的市佔率，是日本上市公司。本企業在亞洲、歐洲、美國皆有設立據點。
台灣，則是在台北和新竹設有辦公室。

本次招募韌體工程師。
【工作内容】
・韌體的開發、檢查、測試。
・配合客戶的訂單，進行韌體的改良。
・處理客戶的諮詢，進行資料分析改善。
・與內部部門溝通(業務部門、其他工程部門)

台北:15人
・管理部
・業務部
新竹:50人
・各個工程部門-硬體、軟體、韌體(2~3人)

【職缺魅力】
・位於台灣IT産業的激戰區-新竹，可以學習到最新的資訊、技術等。
・合作的客戶群，多是世界中有名的PC、手寫面板的製造商。
・本公司在業界中知名度高，是一份相當穩定的工作。
・雖然是日系企業，但不需要日文能力!!

job_lists.content:

■面接時間 ：7/15（六）

￼
■施設・職場環境
会社やメーカーと一緒に、働きやすい環境を実現。
リーディングカンパニーとして業界価値を高めるために、そして、エンジニアの選択肢が多い働きやすい職場環境をつくるために、様々な取り組みを行っています。例えば、請負・受託業務のさらなる強化。これにより抜本的な収益構造改善による給与水準の向上や、エンジニアが安定的に強みを磨き続ける環境づくりができるのです。現在53歳の現役エンジニアとしてプロジェクトを統括する社員などからも「人生を通して徹底的に技術を磨くことができる環境」との声が上がっています。これからも、先駆的な事例をつくっていけるよう、新しい挑戦を続けていきます。

■職務内容:
上場企業700社を超える全国の取引先メーカーに赴き、製品開発プロジェクトや設計プロジェクトに弊社の正社員として参加、機械・電気電子・情報・組み込み制御の各分野の設計開発を担当していただきます。

また、入社後は、新人研修やフォローアップ研修、そして経験豊富なエンジニア出身の専任者及び先輩エンジニアによるキャリアアップのサポート制度（キャリアデザインアドバイザー制度）など、手厚い支援体制であなたを支援していきます。 

＜当社が特に注力している5分野＞ 
■3次元設計技術 　■組込ソフトウェア技術 　■CAE技術 　■インバーター技術 　■高周波回路技術

真摯に、そして貪欲に、最先端の技術と自身の未来に、向き合える人。 家電・自動車・輸送機械等の組込・制御の経験のある方★分野、年数不問です。

「従業員一人ひとりが成長してこそ、より高い水準のサービスが提供できる」その考えに基づき、
それぞれのスキルアップや働きやすさを目指した多彩なサポート環境を整えています。
【特徴的な取り組み】
◆「弊社のこれまで取り組んだ技術」＋「今後、国として成長する技術」
上記を客観的･体系的に把握した弊社独自の「技術戦略マップ」を策定。
エンジニアの方向性を明確化し、更なるスキルアップ、キャリアアップを可能に。
◆一人一人の社員のキャリアアップをサポートする、ＣＤＡ（キャリア・デザイン・アドバイザー）制度。
元エンジニアがエンジニアのバリューアップに繋がる教育や研修を用意。
◆業務上必要な技術スキルだけでなく、ヒューマンやビジネススキルを高めることを目的としたとても充実した内容の教育研修制度。
◆エンジニアのありたい姿・ありたい働き方の達成（自己実現）のために全社をあげてサポートする、
自己実現委員会の設置。
◆生涯エンジニアとして生きるも良し。これまでの経験を活かし、他職種へ挑戦するも良し。
一人一人の社員の人生を考え、様々な職種へのキャリアパスも可能。

job_lists.title: C++軟體工程師
job_lists.company: 威旭資訊有限公司
job_lists.content:
如果你不是瘋狂熱愛寫程式
如果你不是執著追求高效能
如果你不是熱衷鑽研新技術
為節省彼此寶貴的時間，請您跳過 。


身為優秀的軟體開發工程師 
你熱愛寫程式但在工作上實際寫程式的時間卻寥寥可數？
你對於新技術很有研究熱忱但公司卻只想得過且過，沿用舊有架構？
你明明有更好的解法， 卻在時間壓力下逼著提出連自己都覺得汗顏的方案？

如果擁有強大軟體開發能力的你正深受其害，甚至被公司歸類為不討喜的族群，威旭資訊是個讓你做出改變的機會！

「不只好，還要更好」是威旭傲驕的偏執， 因此我們從不滿足於現有的技術水平，更因如此，威旭打造一個軟體開發者的夢幻環境，讓有熱情、有天賦的開發工程師能夠在威旭作最擅長也最喜歡作的事！我們敢自豪的說，威旭的開發工程師 90% 以上的時間都只需專注於程式開發與新技術鑽研，沒有流於形式的會議、沒有繁瑣的報告、更沒有與程式開發無關的業務支援！

職務內容
1. 金融系統開發，需處理大量即時訊息傳輸，低耗時、高效能。
2. 軟體架構設計，API開發。
3. Linux kernel，Linux system performance tuning。
4. 新技術或程式架構的測試實驗。

具備技能
1. C++，須具備multithreading/socket/design pattern開發經驗者。
2. 需熟悉Linux environment。
3. Linux核心驅動運作原理及實作方法。
4. 有能力處理多專案，可獨立運作解決問題，亦可偕同團隊合作。

You will work closely with the rest of the engineering and innovation team to support on-going development of Nexusguard Services. 
The successful candidate is innovative, self-directed, with the ability to learn fast and a passion for delivering high quality support services and driving down operational burden. He/She will also be comfortable working independently in a close-knit team of talented engineers.

● Perform a broad array of the coding and design in order to enhance our service 
● Be a key player at the core of our talented team
● Responsible for developing DDoS defense service on cloud platform.
● Responsible for developing new system/program/software and prototype; and necessary components to assure production of a quality product
● Synthesize design requirements into action with minimal direct oversight.
● Research and conduct system analysis and development to keep our systems current with changing technologies

Degree in Computer Science or related discipline, or equivalent work experience.

● Expert knowledge of HTML, CSS, JavaScript, JQuery.
● Expert knowledge of NoSQL/SQL databases
● Experience designing RESTful APIs.
● Experience translating design mockups and prototypes into working application designs.

A Plus:

● Experience with Go language.

● Knowledge of natural language processing and information retrieval.
● Knowledge of image processing and pattern recognition.

job_lists.title: System Reliability Specialist
job_lists.company: 禦騰科技有限公司
job_lists.content:
JOB PURPOSE
System Reliability Engineers are hybrid systems and software engineers who are responsible and take ownership for reliability, automation, and other issues related to keeping the service uptime in Nexusguard foundation. SREs are integrated within the DevOPs team who will be a part of developing infrastructure software, maintaining it, and scaling it.

KEY ACCOUNTABILITY AREA
● Contribute to design, write and deliver software to improve the reliability, scalability, latency, and efficiency of your services.   
● Solve problems relating to mission critical services and create solutions to prevent problem recurrence; with the goal of automating response to all non-exceptional service conditions.   
● Influence and contribute to new designs, architectures, standards and methods for large-scale distributed systems.   
● Engage in service capacity planning and demand forecasting, software performance analysis and system tuning. 
● Participates in the final roll out of new releases. This includes performance and site acceptance testing that will assure adherence to functional specifications.
● Monitoring high level product problem concerns and seeking commitment from appropriate departments so that necessary actions can be taken
● Serving as an expert in the application of product problem and/or reliability analysis techniques.
● Perform root cause analysis for production issues where the root cause is in infrastructure, environment, configuration, or deployment routines; understand when to escalate to product development teams; remediate root causes and implement preventative actions.
● Participate in after-hours maintenance when necessary, respond to emergencies, participate in customer calls when called upon in support of initiatives and incident response
● Creating complex and/or new reports and metrics
● Participate in 24*7 rotation duties
job_lists.other_condition:
Education and Professional Certificate Level:
● BS Degree in Computer Science, Electrical & Computer Engineering or Mathematics or equivalent experience 

Length and Type of Job-Relevant Experience:  
● 5+ years of experience and outstanding coding skills in C, C++, C#, Java, Python or similar languages   
● 1+ years of experience in testing, deploying and supporting services   
● Experience in SDLC and Agile projects   
● A passion for building and participating in highly effective teams and development processes   
● Expertise in problem solving and analyzing distributed systems and critical production service environments   
● Debugging, testing / validation and analytics/SQL skills.   
● Big data experience preferred (COSMOS, Hadoop)   
● Fundamental understanding of OSI model/stack   
● Strong communication and collaboration skills to work with people from a variety of technical backgrounds

You'll be responsible to architect, design and implement the heart that makes our future products tick.Responsibilities:  Research new image and color processing techniques and technologies for digital camera systems;  Design and develop new algorithms for image and color processing;  Expand our ISP solution to new levels of functionality, quality, and performance;  Assist the hardware design team with algorithm implementation and validation;  Image quality tuning and measure;  Algorithm documentation.Requirements:   Masters or above degree in CS or EE;  Approximately 5+ to 8+ years of relevant industry experience;  Familiar with image and color processing techniques, including AWB, AGC/AEC, color correction, noise reduction, gamma correction, CFA demosaicing, etc;  A solid working understanding of colorimetry and image sensing technology;  Hands on experience with mobile cameras a plus;  Strong C/C++ and MATLAB programming skills;  Organizational skills, computer skills, writing and researching skills.

job_lists.title: Android 工程師
job_lists.company: 年頡科技股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
### 你將會負責
1. 開發很酷、使用者體驗很好、全世界數十億人使用的Android App。
2. 和我們超強的PM還有Designer一起討論並且打造出的很棒App。

### 我們希望你擁有的特質
1. 喜歡下載並且試用各式各樣的App。
2. 每當Android有發布新的東西都興奮不已。
3. 除了對程式開發感到濃厚興趣之外，還能有自己另外的興趣喜好。
4. 懂得時間分配、清楚自己要的是什麼。
5. 積極學習新知和技能的熱情。
6. 正確傳達資訊的溝通能力。

### 我們希望你擁有的專業技能
1. Android開發經驗超過一年，並且有在不同螢幕尺寸和解析度、不同品牌手機開發的經驗。
2. 熟悉Android SDK、Design Guideline、Java、OO的概念。
3. 知道如何使用第三方Library（不論是使用Gradle或是pull下來）。
4. 知道如何串接後端RESTful API或第三方API（例如：Facebook, Google...等）。
4. 會用Git做版本控管和共同協作，知道git reset --soft和--hard的差異。
5. 對 UI/UX 設計敏感度佳，注重細節和使用流程，能從使用者角度思考。

### 你會這些更好
1. 從構想 -> UI設計 -> Coding -> 測試 -> 上架能一手包辦。
1. 在台上做過技術分享，能將自己會的技術與晚輩分享。
2. 喜歡參與技術社群，對技術保持熱情和開放的好奇心。
3. 有自己的Github專案，曾經contribute其他專案那會更棒。
4. 擁有自己的作品集或上架經驗。

job_lists.title: NAND Flash Application Manager/Leader (NVM System)
job_lists.company: 台灣卓榮集成電路科技有限公司
job_lists.content: Function: The NAND Flash Application Manager will lead a young and energetic engineering team, responsible for NAND specs, features, command sequences, characterization, and NAND failure analysis for state-of-art SSD architecture. This position will require reading and understanding flash specs from multiple vendors and interpreting them to determine the best sequences and algorithms to use. He/she also need to maintain a complete media matrix with all different parameters, (e.g. timing, power, physical data....etc) which tracks any change from NAND vendors. The matrix will be used by SSD development team as bible to design state-of-the-art system. The leader also need to apply his/her detail understanding of NAND flash physics, MLC/TLC technology and protocols to come out algorithm for endurance and reliability improvement. He/she will work on flash management system test plan for operation and drive NAND FA processes.
job_lists.other_condition:
Qualifications
. Requires a minimum of a MSEE or related degree, plus 5 years NAND memory system experience.
. Good hands on working knowledge of flash technology and NAND management of integrating 3D TLC into SSD systems.
. Experience of debugging and solving flash problems in complex flash management systems.
. Experience of creating, evaluating FA on flash devices.
. Good knowledge of 2D MLC and 3D NAND flash physics.
. Must be able to work with other development teams crossing different countries.
. Excellent written, verbal communications and presentation skills.

job_lists.title: 【CD00-01091】軟體開發高級工程師(車用)
job_lists.company: 亞旭電腦股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
We are looking for a full time Software Engineer who is interested in working on a small team to create and produce new Automotive product at Askey. In this role, you will be responsible for developing Android-based system software for Automotive solution. You will work closely with chip vendors and hardware (EE) engineers to build stable, high performance, and reliable platforms for a basis of Automotive product development. The ability of effective bug analysis, issue tracking, problem solving skill is highly demanded in this position. In our small team, you will be expected to have a more perspective view to the entire software system and develop software module in both Linux kernel and Android framework to fulfill the requirements of product functionalities. 

 Reviews product requirement and architectural evaluation in the aspect of software (software requirement specification)
 Participates in the design and review of software design specification
 Works with chip vendors and hardware engineers to build functionalities in BSP
 Collaborates and adds value through providing comments in participation of peer code reviews
 Provides reliable source code and solutions to a variety of problems
 Performs technical root cause analysis and outlines corrective action for given problems
job_lists.other_condition:
 Solid foundation in software engineering
 Experience developing Linux kernel and device driver
 Experience developing Android-based embedded system
 Experience in industrial interface standards such as UART, RS232, RS485, CAN, LIN, USB, I2C, …etc
 Proficient at programming in C
 Experience with following: C++, Java, bash or other shell script
 Experience integrating and maintaining 3rd party software packages
 Demonstrate proficient knowledge and utilization of engineering tools such as configuration management and issue tracking systems, debuggers, emulators, simulators, oscilloscope, and logic analyzers
 Experience working on GPS and LTE relevant technology is a plus

job_lists.title: NO.C129420J007/金融軟體C/C++程式設計師base 台北或者上海
job_lists.company: 104China代企業徵聘人才
job_lists.content:
行業類別：金融業

在上海培訓3～6個月

資格要求
1.職務經驗：3年以上相關工作經驗，熟悉 C/C++ 開發經驗，Oracle數據庫開發經驗；
2.產業經驗：金融業相關
3.大陸經驗：不限
4.其他要求：
-瞭解銀行資金業務或擁有相關工作經驗優先考慮；
-熟悉Linux/Unix環境，包括shell script優先考慮；
-有產品細節設計、代碼模組化設計、和系統框架搭建經驗者優先考慮；　
-具備Oracle資料庫SQL調優經驗者優先；
-自我驅動、勇於承受壓力和挑戰；
-具有創造性和獨立邏輯思考能力；
-遵守團體紀律，善於溝通，有團隊精神；

背景要求
5.學歷：大學、碩士
6.科系：資訊工程相關、資訊管理相關
7.語言：不限

薪酬福利
8.基本月薪：最終薪資由企業方根據面試情況而訂。
9.福利補貼：最終福利由企業方根據面試情況而訂。

工作職責：
- PL/SQL C/C++高品質代碼編寫；
- 在敏捷團隊中作為開發者推進專案；
- 使用開發工具和元件構建系統，包括版本管理、自動化集成、變更管理等；
- 參與系統需求分析和系統設計，精細化產品實現；
- 目標導向，能分辨專案中的優先順序，並如期交付；
- 在某些工作中可以獨當一面，做出有影響力的工作；

溫馨提示:若您在投遞簡歷後的30天未接到/收到本公司的任何電話/郵件形式的面試通知，確定您暫時不符合本公司的職位要求，還望海涵。

代徵企業介紹：
關於ComStar
ComStar由境外公司與大陸公司合資成立，是人民幣資金交易風險管理的最大系統供應商，也是以應用託管模式進行交易前中後風險管理的全球領先FinTech服務商。客戶自主研發的ComStar軟體協助中國上百家金融機構管理關鍵資金風控環節，包括政策性銀行、四大商業銀行、股份制銀行、城商行、外資銀行、農商行、農信社、農合社、券商和財務公司。作為人民幣資金市場的科技引導者，ComStar通過創新性的SaaS雲服務託管模式實現與全國性集中交易平臺的無縫連結，保障安全高效的本外幣、前中後一體化直通式處理，對人民幣資金市場50%以上的交易進行有效風險管控。客戶總部位於上海陸家嘴，在上海張江、北京、廣州、廈門、成都和臺北均設辦公室。

為何加入ComStar
是否想真正的參與中國人民幣國際化這一有意義的歷史進程？
是否想瞭解中國債券、外匯、理財交易的domain knowhow和FinTech服務模式？
是否想和技術先趨一起挑戰High Competitive模式開發發掘自己的潛能？
是否想體驗國際金融中心上海和臺北的雙城SMART工作生活？
如果你不想錯過FinTech新科技、熱愛解決問題、不怕壓力挑戰，無論您是剛畢業或是有開發經驗，請加入我們！

ComStar為您提供
行業前景：央行批准設立的金融科技企業，金融科技時代交易風險管理軟體的研發，唯一實現人民幣外幣、前中後一體化直通式處理的解決方案。
專業團隊：技術團隊由前彭博合夥人帶隊，產品團隊由來自四大會計師事務所的資深專家領軍，銷售團隊則由在中國耕耘十數年的前路透社王牌銷售掌舵，工作夥伴們不乏來自臺灣的開發前輩和大陸名校, 海歸, A咖。
個人發展：公司成立五年，客戶快速擴張超過130家，FINTECH 年度用戶費關已經邁入台幣十億RMB二億大關，你可以在國際金融中心上海感受大陸銀行間市場的波濤壯闊，拒絕「小確幸」。
薪酬福利：具有競爭力的薪酬，帶薪年假，探親和住房補助，補充商業醫療保險，免費年度體檢，你還可以選擇Base在上海或者臺北。
員工培訓：對新人提供定製化培訓和培養計畫，不限於技術培訓和帶教，還有外匯交易和本幣市場的深度課程，讓你成為懂業務的技術達人！

Welcom to join Ruckus, you can have chance to touch the technologies, such as Cassandra, JGroups, ElasticSearch...etc. We would like to invite you to join Ruckus of our success and challenge journey!


Minimum Qualifications
* Strong motivation and dare to accept challenge 
* 5+ years of practical experience in software development of commercial-grade applications with Java/J2EE.
* Practical experience in Shell/Python Script
* Hands-on experience in developing Java application on Linux platform

Preferred Qualifications
* Familiar with Cassandra, JGroup, ElasticSearch
* Experience in Linux system performance tuning
* Familiar with Linux Networking related knowledge

job_lists.title: 61210-Linux System Engineer (資深)研發工程師
job_lists.company: QNAP_威聯通科技股份有限公司
job_lists.content: 本職務主要負責 NAS 各式硬體平台移植及 Linux/FreeBSD 新功能開發維護及效能調校, 本職務須具備高度自我管理能力, 能針對產品開發需求大量閱讀 protocol specification, datasheet 及 Linux/FreeBSD source code 並進行必要的開發與設計驗證。針對產品的穩定性及效能有高度的自我期許, 職務內容包含:1. Bootloader 新功能開發維護。2. SOC Hardware Offload Engine Driver 新功能開發維護。3. Enclosure Management (i2C, GPIO, EC) Driver 新功能開發維護。4. Hardware Abstraction Layer (HAL) 移植及新功能開發維護。5. Linux Mutiple Device/Device Mapper 新功能開發維護及效能調校。6. Linux SCSI LLD/ATA Port Driver 新功能開發維護及效能調校。7. FreeBSD NTB/CAM driver 新功能開發維護及效能調校。7. Linux/FreeBSD Network/WIFI subsystem 新功能開發維護及效能調校。 8. NAS system profiling. 9. 工廠生產, 測試程式開發維護。10. 規劃、執行與維護量產的產品。11. 協助研發軟體新技術與新工具。DescriptionsThis position will be responsible for the new board bring up, Device Drivers, Kernel, new CPU architecture development/integration for QNAP Linux Operating System. Qualifications1. Master degree (or above) of the computer science, electronics or other related majors; 2. Good understand to the computer architecture and operating system; 3. Good understand and experience to at least one kind of popular embedded processors, e.g. PowerPC, MIPS, ARM, X86; 4. Good skills of C and assembly languages; 5. 5 years of the Linux Kernel, and/or BSP, and/or Device Drivers development for embedded systems; 6. Good communication skills, team work capability and self-motivated; Preferences1.Familiar with the Linux kernel mechanism, such as Interrupt handling/deferred processing/synchronization mechanisms, etc; 2.One or more Device Driver programming experience on: Ethernet, PCIe, NOR/NANDflash, USB, SATA; 3.Good debugging skills, such as using KGDB or KDB to debug linux drivers;
job_lists.other_condition: –Good understand to the computer architecture and operating system; –Good skills of C / C++ programming language and coding style; –Good debugging skills, such as using KGDB or GDB to debug kernel and user mode software; –Good understand and experience to at least one kind of popular embedded processors, e.g. PowerPC, MIPS, ARM, X86; –Familiar with the Linux kernel mechanism, such as Interrupt handling/deferred processing/synchronization mechanisms, etc; –Experience with storage stack component development is a plus: file system, page cache, RAID, LVM, crypto, device mapper, multipath device drivers;–Familiar with storage protocols such as SCSI, SAS, SATA or iSCSI;–Experience with network drivers/stack and packet processing flow;–Familiar with Linux kernel profiling tool, such as perf or oprofile;

job_lists.title: 61280-軟韌體研發工程師/台北(106年度研發替代役)

job_lists.content: 這職缺是威聯通企業存儲事業部的軟韌體研發工作，主要工作在於開發企業資訊中心及雲端資料中心所需的高階存儲裝置。工作於六到十人的團隊，主要是在處理資料路徑和存儲平台的韌體研發工作。主要工作在於開發該系統的存儲核心軟體，密切相關於Linux/FreeBSD/Unix作業系統和特有的存儲系統操作及功能，處理資料服務，資料的完整性，適用性和其它關鍵存儲系統功能。工程師必須具備在商業級軟體開發經驗。應徵者應表現出其具有靈活性，強大的抗壓性，出色的解決問題能力，並在過往的工作記錄中，能證明具有滿足專案期限性的能力。職責包括系統軟體設計，開發設計和整合存儲產品中各個組成模組。應徵者應該熟悉物件導向的設計和開發，作業系統技術，及現代軟體工程的原則。
job_lists.other_condition:
1. 精通 C 語言，有一年以上 Unix 開發經驗。
2. 熟悉 Python 或 Shell Script。
3. 熟悉網路儲存設備相關概念。
4. 了解 Virtualization/Docker 相關概念。

job_lists.title: Firmware Engineer
job_lists.company: 酷碼科技股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
Cooler Master is currently seeking firmware Engineer with the primary responsibility to work on creative embedded system firmware. In this role, you will focus to implement firmware coding to enable our product with micro-controller and application processors using different skills. You will be working with partners and team members to help bring product to production in several product categories. 
• Work on embedded system/micro controllers like ARM, MIPS, 8051, PIC, AVR, or others in environment like Linux, RTOS, Raspberry Pi, Arduino, and other systems 
• Hands on working on code and perform review of code from out sourcing partner, manage code release process together with software PM
job_lists.other_condition:
Qualifications

• Computer/Information major with minimum 3 years or related major with 5 years of experience in firmware implementation for embedded system/ IoT.
• Proficient in C, C++, Python, Assembly and other modern programming languages, tools like Bugzilla, Jira, Git, etc. 
• Experienced working with embedded controller boards, working knowledge of processors (like ARM (A and M), MIPS..etc) and experience of network stack internals, USB, I2C, SPI, PWM, GPIO, Ethernet, BT, SATA…etc and other common interfaces. 
• Expertise in developing kernel space module. Eg: device drivers (character/block/network), Interrupt, System call…etc.
• Experience with Open source software and community, especially Linux, Arduino, Raspbian… etc.
• Able to setup, operate and maintain GDB, ICE, JTAG, debugger, etc.

job_lists.title: 助理電子工程師
job_lists.company: 佛昌科技有限公司
job_lists.content:
職務說明 應徵者必須在經歷或自傳中，簡述下列 6項的經驗,能力或興趣。
1. 必須對電子技術有興趣，記憶力好，理解力佳，學習能力強，(在校成績優秀者加分)。
   必須對電子技術有熱忱，熟悉微電子學之基礎理論與實務。
2. 理工相關科系畢業，基本電學，電子學基礎良好，或是物理基礎良好。
   必須熟悉各種電子儀器原理與操作，熟悉各種電子元件之特性與運用。
3. 熟悉微電子學之基礎理論，對於電子電路有基本觀念及學習興趣。
   經常需要研究或維修或改善陌生的儀器或設備，最少需熟悉一種以上電子設計或機構設計的輔助軟體。
4. 學習過單晶片，C語言程式設計，嵌入式系統，半導體物理與製程等相關課程。
   熟悉一種以上的MCU硬體設計與熟悉C語言,組語程式設計，熟悉嵌入式系統。
5. 需熟悉一種以上電子設計或機構設計的輔助軟體。
   有半導體設備電子電路維修或改善經驗者加分，熟悉半導體設備原理或半導體製程者加分。
6. 協助專案的執行，試作，維修，資料搜尋與整理分析等相關工作。

job_lists.title: Linux Embedded Engineer
job_lists.company: Tomofun_友愉股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
・About the role:
We are looking for a Senior Embedded Firmware Engineer to join our hardware product development team. The ideal candidate has experience bringing up new embedded hardware platforms and development of manufacturing test software. 

As the firmware software expert on the team, you will assume ownership of the firmware from development, integration, test to manufacturing. You will collaborate with electrical engineering on the hardware design and implementation process throughout the development. You will write firmware, programs, scripts as necessary to test embedded systems to support design verification and high volume production test activities.   

・About the company:
At Tomofun, we LOVE pets and technology. Our vision is to bring joy and innovation to every pet lover in the world. Headquartered in Taiwan, we’re building a one-of-a-kind global company that helps pets and pet parents stay connected through our innovative products. Our pioneer product, Furbo Dog Camera, is the #1 best selling pet camera on Amazon US, Canada, UK, and Japan. The learning curve is steep. But the work is exhilarating. Tomofun is on the cusp on a pet-tech boom and we’re looking for smart, innovative thinkers who aspire to incredible things. 

・What you’ll do:
- Understand the product, plan and requirements
- Identify system improvements and mitigate risks
- Develop exceptional, engaging and connected systems
- Implement reliable, saleable, and quality functionality
- Maintain and evolve documentation and processes
- Take ownership of the quality, functionality and behavior of what you deliver
- Work with product management to define what you'll need to deliver and when
- Work closely with the executive staff to align expectations and provide status

・Who you are:
- You’re not just looking for a job, you’re looking for an innovative product where you can make a large impact
- Thrive on learning new technologies and don’t believe in one-size-fits-all solutions. 
- Strong C/C++ programming skills
- Experience with driver development, board level development
- Experiences with microcontroller board development and debugging
- Exposure to consumer electronics development product lifecycle and processes
- Strive on proving that speed and quality are not conflicting; that you can achieve both at the same time.
- In addition to having an intimate knowledge of the hardware, you understand how all the pieces fit together (front-end, database, network layer, etc.) and how they impact the performance of your program.
- You feel ownership over everything you ship; you'd never call code "released" until you’re confident it’s correct. You pride yourself on efficient monitoring, strong documentation, and proper test coverage.
- Sharp, motivated co-workers in a fun office environment.
- Able to communicate freely in both English and Mandarin with your team.

・Benefits:
-Medical insurance and free yearly health checkup
-Unlimited vacation policy; work hard and take time off when you need it.
-2 free Furbo are given to each full-time team member.
-Afternoon tea time twice a month and birthday party every month.
-Tomofun library is full of interesting books that you can borrow anytime you want.
-You’re welcomed to join our volunteer program. We are a group of people who is passionate to give back to society.
-Company trip and employee outing program.
-Monthly meeting and lunch party. Life is not only work in Tomofun.
-Internal training workshop and external training subsidy let you expend your skill set.
-Flexible working hours. No more clock in or out !
-There’re always adorable dogs and cats in the office. You’ll never get bored in Tomofun.

job_lists.content: Job DescriptionThe Senior Server BIOS Engineer will be responsible for leading the development efforts of a team of firmware engineers. The Senior Engineer has overall responsibility for the planning, design, coding, integration, and test of our UEFI based Server firmware products. He or she must have a track record of accomplishments in delivering PC based Server products.Skill Requirements and Job Functionso Must be able to balance the schedule demands of the customers with the skills of the engineers.o Must have expertise with PC, Server, and BIOS/UEFI technology at a proficiency level sufficient to guide junior engineers, be viewed as a competent technical advisor to the customers, and other internal groups.o Must be able to interact in English with US engineers and customers in a clear and consistent manner.o Must be able to track engineering progress against schedules and reliably distribute progress information, be tolerant of schedule pressures while working with new code and new hardware and inflexible delivery dates, and be able to handle unexpected events with calmness, mental agility, and creativity.o Must show a track record of progressive increases in technical responsibilities, be able to collaborate with other engineering groups to leverage each other’s efforts, to support QA and code release processes.Technical Requirementso BS or MS in Computer Science or EE, or 5 years of equivalent experience.o 7+ years experience in the developing PC based Server firmware products. o Must be proficient in C and x86 ASM, Windows development environment and tools, Intel/AMD Server CPU and its chipset, Server hardware architecture, and project management tools.o Experienced in PC power and system configuration management, Networking & storage protocols, Server diagnostics or boot load processes preferred..o PC BIOS experience highly desirable, particularly with the new UEFI standards.

job_lists.title: BMC Engineer - Hyve Solutions
job_lists.company: 海峰電腦股份有限公司
job_lists.content: Come join the firmware engineering team at Hyve! Hyve Solutions specializes in providing our customers with purpose-built data center servers and solutions. Help us design server platforms at scale.PRINCIPAL DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES (ESSENTIAL FUNCTIONS)This is a BMC Engineering position within the Hyve Solutions – Taipei City, Engineering Team. In this position, you will be responsible for defining, testing, delivering and documenting for Hyve Solutions products, supporting the next generation of Hyve Solutions roadmap. You will be responsible for authoring IPMI Firmware specifications, executing unit test and debugging/troubleshooting potential issues. You will be working closely OEM/ODM vendor and be responsible for all software and firmware related issues during the planning, development, and validation stages of the program. Your responsibilities will include but not be limited to: - Designing, documenting and debugging IPMI firmware. - Working with platform engineer and services team to provide support for pre-sales/post- sales activities. - Learn, analyze and implement new interfaces and subsystems, break down complex issues and collaborate across cross-functional teams to resolve issues in a timely manner.
job_lists.other_condition: MINIMUM REQUIREMENTS :You must possess a minimum of a Bachelor degree in Electrical Engineering, Computer Science and/or Engineering in a related field with more than three years of firmware and/or software development experience. Additional qualifications include: * Familiar with ASPEED BMC architecture (AST2300/2400/2500) * Familiar with interfaces SMBUS, SPI, IPMB, UART, PECI 3.0 and LPC * Working knowledge of IPMI firmware vendor (AMI) and code structure,ability to define and identify the specific IPMI firmware requirements * Familiar with IPMI 2.0 spec * Familiar with PMBUS 1.2 spec * Strong C/C++ coding skills * Excellent system-level debugging skills - Ability in organizing and managing multiple projects, setting priorities and working independently under aggressive timelines * Good English speaking and literacy - Good communication and documentation skillsNICE TO HAVE: * Experience with networking device development is plus. (e.g, switch, router) * Experience with network protocol UDP, ARP, SNMP, SYSLOG and NCSI are plus * Experience with USB device driver

job_lists.title: Senior Embedded Software Engineer
job_lists.company: 雲動科技股份有限公司
job_lists.content: We are looking for talented and passionate Embedded Software Engineer to be part of an exciting team. You will have an enormous opportunity to make a large impact on the design, architecture, and implementation of cutting edge Personal Cloud products used every day, by people you know. In this role, you will: - Be responsible for system architecture and development of new features for embedded systems - Investigate, prototype and deliver new and innovative system solutions - Design, develop and verify firmware for embedded systems - Participate in design reviews, API development, and documentation - Work with new technologies that are vital to product development - Deliver investigation plans and reports, architectural documents, design specs, software and firmware source code, build scripts - Perform tasks including debug, bring-up, Beta and production software development - Successfully collaborate with both software and hardware product teams Basic Qualifications -Bachelor’s degree in Electrical Engineering, Computer Science or related field -3+ years of experience as a software engineer - Experience in embedded software design, development and debugging - Experience in coding in C/C++ - Experience with RTOS - System level integration experience including open source packages - Experience in Computer Science fundamentals: object-oriented design, data structures, algorithm design, problem solving, and complexity analysis - Experience with Linux development environments - Knowledge of packet processing and networking technologies - Networking experience related to switching, routing and tunnelling protocols such as IPv4, VXLAN, OSPF- Specific development experience following formal SW development life cycles - Agile development experience, a bonus. - Knowledge of Clearcase, Clearquest, Git or similar configuration management tools. Preferred Qualifications: - Strong debugging/trouble-shooting skills of embedded systems - Expertise with Linux kernel and application software development - Experience with real time debugging tools (software and hardware) - Experience with at least one scripting language

job_lists.title: Manager, Application Engineering
job_lists.company: Ubee_互動寬頻科技股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
1. Providing technical support and services to customers. The support and services includes requirement clarification, issue identification, software project management, and solution proposals.
2. Technical support for Broadband CPE products like Cable modem, DSL IAD, MoCA ECB, WiFi repeater
3. Plan SW development & SQA schedule, fix tickets created by FAE/ throughout the project life-cycle, 
4. Participate the solution validation process with PM, SoC, HW & SW R&D
5. Manage the ODM R&D resources to develop new firmware
6. Manage the ODM SQA to plan test cases and executions
7. Host engineering conference meeting with partners
8. Lead and manage the application engineer team
9. Lead to integrate certain 3rd party solution like CPE middleware provider, Home automation, WiFi solution, etc
10. Software architecture design based on customer’s requirements.
11. Allocate software resources based on project priority.
12. Survey and maintain the outsourced software ODM opportunities.
13. Conduct code inspection and review to ensure the product software quality.
14. Review unit test plan/report and integration test plan/report from software engineers. 
15. Review release note for new software release listing features/functions, bug fixed and known issues.
job_lists.other_condition:
- Working knowledge and experience in following areas is a MUST:
- Broadcom CPE SW
- VoIP
- Network Management: SNMP / TR-069 
- Working knowledge of networking protocols including TCP/IP, Ethernet is a MUST.
- Knowledge and Linux programming experience with C++/C for embedded system development is a plus
- Experiences in Broadband CPE device (xDSL, WiFi AP, cable gateway) is a plus
- Good communication and interpersonal skills. 
- A good team player who is well organized, self-motivated and attentive to details. 

- Familiar with Internet protocol, such as TCP/IP, voip and etc. 
- Better to have CCNA, CCNP cert; 
- Ability to handle the issues alone; 
- Good at communicating. Work with passion and customer service sense. 
- Experienced to lead 3-5 persons. SW engineer experience is an plus.

job_lists.title: Software Project Engineer
job_lists.company: 網件有限公司
job_lists.content:
As a member of the Netgear Engineering team, you will be responsible for managing the development of Networking Applications for Routers, Home Gateway, Wi-Fi extenders products.  These products will incorporate most of the following technologies:   DNS/DHCP, IP, HTTP, SNMP, 802.11n/ac/ad Wireless, Ethernet, VPN, Firewalls.  

The primary function of a Software Project Engineer at NETGEAR is project management and technical oversight.  The product development engineer manages the 3rd party application development vendors and ODMs to ensure that mobile applications are delivered in a timely fashion to a high quality and in accordance with the NETGEAR procedures and systems.  Software project engineer works with PLM to define the software project requirement and is responsible for developing functional specification of the Software project.

Job Responsibilities

• For assigned projects, take overall responsibility for delivering the applications ( iOS, Android, desktop); including requirements generation,  firmware, functional specification, and documentation,   Agile release requirements, per Netgear policies.  It is expected that projects should be managed with minimal supervision.  
• Project management.  Develop, publish and meet schedules, keep all stakeholders informed of product status at all times
• Project Execution.  Manage the suppliers' (ODM, application developers, etc.) SW development process. 
• Product Verification.  Manage verification testing of product features and performance and able to test field issues as needed.  
• Manage beta testing of the applications.  Follow Netgear beta process and resolved issues reported by beta users.
• Documentation. Provide input for manuals, help files, gift boxes, application notes and tech support web pages.
• Support. Resolve any 3rd level technical support escalations.  
• Travel as necessary to work with ODM/3rd party vendor 
• Track industry technology developments, supplier roadmaps, standards bodies and make product recommendations

Skills and Requirements

• BSEE/MSEE with 5-10 years experience in networking software product development
• Hands on mobile SW development is a plus
• Strong understanding of home and WiFi networking.
• Engineering background with significant hands-on experience in product development.
• Strong problem solving skills, able to track and resolve issues.
• Effective organization, project management and coordination skills; ability to get the job done.
• Ability and willingness to take ownership of SW applications; get the job done with minimal supervision.
• Teamwork.  This position requires a close working relationship with the extended Netgear team, including engineering, beta team, customer support, marketing and program management.  
• Good communication skills, both written and verbal.
• Experience working in a start-up environment.
• Self-starter that works well on a team.
• Adaptive to ever-changing situations and answer the challenges

job_lists.title: V2X (Vehicle-to-Everything) Application Engineer (車間通訊應用軟體工程師)
job_lists.company: 亞勳科技股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
Job Description (職務說明)：
works with the global team to develop and demonstrate V2X (Vehicle-to-Everything) concepts. Defines the V2X application software requirements on company’s platform, OS environment and development tools. 

Core Responsibility (負責工作): 
communicates with hardware platform engineer, IEEE 1609.x/ ETSI TC-ITS protocol engineer, and works with an engineering counterpart to define and develop V2X (Car2X, C-ITS) application software.
 
Details of Job Functions (詳細工作內容):
- Works with Systems Engineering to specify hardware platform requirements         and needed vehicle interfaces
- Works with customers to understand OEM software architecture direction, and influence direction as appropriate
- Participates in definition of V2X features including estimation of complexity and resource requirements
- Participates in developing V2X demonstration features and properties

Reporting (報告):
- Reports directly to the V2X Application Software Manager
job_lists.other_condition:
Requirements (資歷需求):
-Bachelor degree in Engineering or technical discipline required. Advanced technical degree preferred.
- 1 year experience developing and debugging automotive software in a real-time, embedded, multiprocessor, multi-interface environment preferred.
- Working knowledge of V2X Protocol Stack: ETSI ITS/G5, IEEE 1609.x, IEEE 802.11p, SAE J2735, IEEE 1609.11 preferred.
- Good internal/external communication skills

job_lists.content:
Job Description (職務說明)：
provides integration support for company’s Wi-Fi RF modules and Wi-Fi Access Point Platform. The position is both technical and customer oriented to ensure design wins with company’s products. Will work with global teams, internal and external, to drive projects to completion. Working with minimal supervision and self-learning is expected.

Core Responsibility (負責工作): 
provides integration support and technical assistance for company’s products to FAE, FSE, and high-value customers. Actively works with customers on design activities and resolving issues. Coordinates new firmware releases from engineering to production.  

Details of Job Functions (詳細工作內容):
- Ability to work in cross-functional, and global, teams in a highly collaborative manner.
- Strong in embedded programming and firmware design.
- Familiar with Linux Open Source and C/C++ programming language.
- Working with minimal supervision and self-learning, actively works with customers on design activities and resolving issues to drive projects to completion. 
- Good written and verbal communication skills

- In-depth knowledge on TCP/IP and related network protocols is a plus.
