job_lists.title: 1006440 BMC FW Developer
job_lists.company: Hewlett Packard Enterprise_慧與科技股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
Analyzes, designs, programs, debugs and modifies firmware (e.g., DSP, embedded code, BIOS). Work often involves analog and digital hardware and real-time operating systems. Position requires knowledge and exposure to hardware design. Typically programs in machine language, assembly language and high-level languages (e.g., C, C++).



Responsibilities: 

•Designs limited enhancements, updates, and programming changes for portions and subsystems of firmware, including DSP, embedded code, EFI drivers, EFI applications and BIOS/UEFI
•Analyzes design and determines coding, programming, and integration activities required based on specific objectives and established project guidelines.
•Executes and writes portions of testing plans, protocols, and documentation for assigned portion of application; identifies and debugs issues with code and suggests changes or improvements.
•Participates as a member of project team of other firmware engineers and internal and outsourced development partners to develop reliable, cost effective and high quality solutions for assigned systems portion or subsystem.
•Collaborates and communicates with internal and outsourced development partners regarding firmware design status, project progress, and issue resolution.




Education and Experience Required: 

•Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, Electrical Engineering, or equivalent.
•Typically 2-4 years experience.




Knowledge and Skills: 

•Using firmware design tools and languages.
•Ability to apply analytical and problem solving skills.
•General understanding of firmware and hardware design, including interactions and integrations of firmware with hardware
•Firmware testing methodology, including execution of test plans, debugging, and testing scripts and tools
•Strong written and verbal communication skills; mastery in English and local language.
•Ability to effectively communicate design proposals and negotiate options.

job_lists.content: About this JobThis is a remote technical support role (NOT call center) who should be an expert in various IT areas and provide timely and professional troubleshooting advice and architectural best practice to AWS customers via support cases and occasional on-site visits.Within the team, we have gurus used to work on Linux kernel drivers, with PhD in High-Performance Computing (HPC) and as senior networking Operation & Maintenance (O&M) engineer.We are seeking people with strong technical skills. Experience with Big Data and/or Database (MySQL, SQL Server, Oracle)? Do you know the advantages of working in a highly distributed virtual environment? Since we’re working in the Cloud, you will need to be very comfortable with networking technologies including DNS, TCP/IP, SSL, DHCP and Load Balancing. If you fit the description, you might be the person we are looking for!Every Day Will Bring New And Exciting Challenges On The Job While You•Learn and use groundbreaking technologies•Apply advanced troubleshooting techniques to provide unique solutions to our customers' individual needs•Interact with leading technologists around the world•Work directly with Amazon Web Service architects to help reproduce and resolve customer issues•Leverage your extensive customer support experience to provide feedback to internal AWS teams on how to improve our services•Drive customer communication during critical events•Drive projects that improve support-related processes and our customers’ technical support experience•Write tutorials, how-to videos, and other technical articles for the AWS customer community•Work on critical, highly complex customer problems that may span multiple AWS servicesBasic Qualification•Strong customer focus•Must have demonstrated expertise in the below areas:•Networking (DNS, TCP/IP, HTTP, VLAN, etc.)•Systems administration (Linux and/or Windows Servers)•Bachelor’s degree in Information Science / Information Technology, Computer Science, Engineering, Mathematics, Physics, or a related field.•Excellent oral and written communication skills in both English and Mandarin•Open to working shifts (e.g. 7am-4pm or 2pm-11pm, Sun-Thu or Tue-Sat)•Strong multi-tasking skills•Self-starter who is excited about technology
job_lists.other_condition: Preferred Qualification•Big Data (Hadoop, Map/Reduce, etc.)•Databases (MySQL, Oracle, MS SQL Server, etc.)•Virtualization (OpenStack, Xen, KVM, etc.) •Programming / scripting (Java, Perl, Ruby, C#, and/or PHP)•Exposure to Cloud computing•Exposure to security concepts / best practices•Expertise with IPsec, VPN, Load Balancing, Iperf, MTR, Routing Protocols, SSH, Network Monitoring / Troubleshooting tools•Experience managing full application stacks from the OS up through custom applications•Remote technical support or system administrator experience

job_lists.content: ST&T感謝每一個投遞履歷的求職者，我們珍惜 您給ST&T多一次找到人才的機會，但在您投遞履歷之前，請帶著愉悅的心情閱讀以下說明：首先我們需要的是iOS/iPad開發人才，所以請確認 您是否符合下列條件，1.具 Objective C 基礎開發能力2.熟悉 iOS 7.x以上 SDK 及 Xcode 開發環境3.需有實際開發經驗，有 Networking , SQLite, UIKit, XML/JSON, Framework, cocos2D, Graphic, APNS Notification, Audio/Video, Sensor , 3D ,Cloud Storage , Multi-language , User Experience 相關知識和經驗4.需熟悉版本控制，熟 git 尤佳5.貫徹執行專案計劃6.能有自己思維改進既有演算法架構者 7.對開發應用程式有高度熱誠者8. 應屆畢業生需附成績單另外，我們也需要Android／平板 開發人才，所以請確認 您是否符合下列條件，1.具 Java 基礎開發能力2.熟悉Android 4.x 以上SDK 及 eclipse , Android Studio 或 Intellij IDEA 開發環境。3.需有實際開發經驗，有Networking , SQLite, XML/JSON , JNI ,Graphic, Push Notification, Service ,Active/View, BroadcastReceiver,ContentProvide,Intent, Sensor, ,Audio/Video, 3D , Cloud Storage, Multi-language, Experience 相關知識和經驗。4.需熟悉版本控制，熟 git 尤佳5.貫徹執行專案計劃6.能有自己思維改進既有演算法架構者7.對開發應用程式有高度熱誠者  8. 應屆畢業生需附成績單若您沒有100%符合，也沒有關係，若您對於iOS／Android 開發有超強的學習能力，我們也歡迎您的加入！意者請自備完整履歷自傳。面談時請帶可demo 的個人作品。

job_lists.company: PHOENIX TECHNOLOGIES LTD_美商鳳凰科技資訊股份有限公司台灣分公司
job_lists.content:
Phoenix Technologies Ltd. is the global market leader in system firmware that provides the most secure foundation for today's computing environments. The Company established industry leadership with its original BIOS products in 1979, and today has 149 technology patents, has shipped in over one billion systems, and continues to ship in over 125 million new systems each year. 

The Phoenix Technologies BIOS group is looking for an experienced engineer in Customer Engineering Group. There are several diverse software activities in this group. Various responsibilities include:

1. Ability to solve technical issues independently
2. Hands-on Role to complete Customer projects 
3. Provide technical training/presentation on specific technical topics
4. Provide guidance and direction to assist fellow team members on technical issues
5. Partner with Team members and the Engineering Team to solve difficult technical issues
6. Study new technical specifications and provide guidance accordingly
7. Understand Customers System Design needs and provide helpful suggestions 
8. Attend technical review meetings via phone with customers/vendors to provide update on technical issues

job_lists.content:

job_lists.company: 荷蘭商聯想股份有限公司
job_lists.content: The primary responsibility of the Systems Engineer is technical ownership of the delivery / refresh of Lenovo Branded S series products.  The Systems engineer will be responsible for working with partners to resolve issues associated with these products while understanding the product features.   This position works in cooperation with the Technical Project Manager and Storage partners to ensure product deliverables are met.   Responsibilities also include coordinating and communicating with multiple teams, including the storage partner’s engineering team, product assurance, supply chain, and support, to ensure product launches and updates are timely and accurate.  The Systems Engineer will be responsible for building product structures and initiating the release into the EC system.  The Systems Engineer should have the ability to coordinate with subject matter experts, worldwide project team members, and work with the technical staff for information development and support.

Act as an advisor to program team regarding projects, tasks, and operations • Document internal business policies and practices.Required Knowledge, Abilities and Skills: Bachelors Degree; CS, EE, or other technical degree• 5-7+ years of directly related experience that includes working with IT systems, preferably storage products. • Working knowledge of storage systems including setup, configuration and associated server/switch infrastructure.• Knowledge of the principles of project management. • Ability to assess customer needs, including business requirements definition, data definitions, and operational requirements definition • Ability to plan work to accomplish project goals • Ability to work independently with minimum supervision • The formal education of a bachelor’s degree is required. Applicants must demonstrate strong skills in oral and written English communication, dedication to working with international team, and understanding of the use of technology. Applicants must also demonstrate experience on projects with a high degree of complexity.

job_lists.title: Global Support Center-Software Engineer
job_lists.company: (ASML)台灣艾司摩爾股份有限公司
job_lists.content: As a GSC engineer you are in charge to solve complex technical problems within your competency: Software. You are owner of the problems that were not solved by our local expert teams at customer site. The difficulties of technical problems are diverse with the phase of the systems maturity. Therefore you will face a challenging set of tasks and responsibilities:As a GSC engineer you are in charge to solve complex technical problems within your competency: Software. You are owner of the problems that were not solved by our local expert teams at customer site. The difficulties of technical problems are diverse with the phase of the systems maturity. Therefore you will face a challenging set of tasks and responsibilities:1. Solving complex technical problems by remote analyzing data and creating deterministic forward looking action plans is key for a GSC Engineer; 2. Good alignment on expectations with the local team and your other GSC colleagues worldwide; 3. Involving additional help from development engineers helps to drive fast incident resolution; 4. On-site support when required to solve the problem at the customer site; 5. Start prevention process: Next to solving a technical problem a GSC engineer is responsible to start the process to prevent the issue of happening again in future. Collaboration with the departments such as CS Service Engineering is necessary to establish that goal;6. Managing (technical) escalations, secure that the right data is available and provide routine updates to management and stakeholders;7. Sharing knowledge and expertise amongst colleagues within the GSC and with local engineers increases the efficiency of our customer service. Travelling on-site when new system types are introduced to customers is an example of this aspect.  The diversity of technical problems encountered in the “Software” team requires a broad knowledge level. This makes that a GSC Software engineer interfaces a lot with other competences and Development and Engineering (D&E). A GSC software engineer grows very valuable general system knowledge. For this reason a job within this team is an excellent starting position for a career in a high tech environment. Growth possibilities in both technical and managerial directions can be thought of.
job_lists.other_condition: Software CompetenceAs a GSC Software engineer you will be responsible to troubleshoot & resolve issues related to equipment problems in the sub-competences: Computer Systems, being hardware and software; Data handling /Configuration tooling and Lot Operations embedded in automation and reporting. You will be analyzing the error log/ computer codes and will reproduce the error codes in an offline workstation. As a software engineer you will also coordinate adaptations and integrate patches. You will analyze the gaps and interact a lot with other competences and D&E. Basically you’ll often be the first point of contact in case the problems aren’t clearly related to a specific competence. This requires a strong analytical skill-set combined with clear and understandable communication.Educational LevelMaster degree in technical science (Physics, Mechatronics, Electronics, Chemistry, Aerospace Engineering, Process technology, etc.) We are also open for bachelors with 2-5 years of experience.ExperienceWe are open for recently graduated engineers but also experienced engineers in a technical problem solving environment/ customer support experience.Knowledge of ASML equipment on a specialized technical level is an advantage but not a necessity.Affinity with Software issues is required; however this position doesn’t require hardcore coding skills. Knowledge about UNIX coding is an advantage!  Personal Skills• “Get things done” mentality;• Strong analytic and abstract capability;• Pro-active initiating attitude;• Flexible in working hours, work environment and travel on short notice (sometimes the same day)• Ability to work in a highly pressured environment; • Independent;• Team worker;• Strong communicator in English (Verbal and Written) (Dutch is a practical advantage);• Good social skills; • Customer-oriented;• Ability to plan and set priorities.The diversity of problems in a fast evolving company requires a continuous drive to stay updated and informed on new technologies, functionalities and products. Being eager to learn and absorb this knowledge are very valuable within GSC.

job_lists.title: HW/FW Applications Engineer (Senior AE)- Storage
job_lists.company: 美商美高森美股份有限公司MICROSEMI CORPORATION
job_lists.content:
About the Job

Microsemi Corporation, Scalable Storage Business Unit (SSBU)

Our Application Engineering team is responsible for working closely with the Product Development teams, Product Validation teams, Marketing teams, and Sales teams to provide world-class technical customer support. We provide technical support to assist in design wins, customer product ramp, and customer product production. We offer a challenging and dynamic working environment with opportunities to make substantial contributions toward the success of our business.

Responsibilities
• Support SAS/SATA Protocol and RAID controller embedded firmware, OS drivers, and management software
• Work closely with Tier 1 OEMs and their ODM partners to define requirements, manage deliverables and support initial bring-up to full production
• Work independently, and in a team environment
• Travel within Taiwan and internationally, as needed to work at customer sites to debug hardware and software for the market leading Microsemi storage devices product lines
• Work closely with cross-functional teams to support customers
• Support hardware/software solutions to assist with new product design wins, customer ramp to production, and production
• Develop verification requirements, understand architectures and HW/SW designs in order to characterize customer related problems, providing timely customer technical support and engineering feedback
• Develop customer level documentation
Qualifications
• Bachelor’s degree in EE, CS, or CE 
• Minimum 5 years of experience
• Strong software/firmware development and debug skills
• Strong fundamental understanding of RAID 
• Experience with mass storage firmware and software
• Familiarity with storage networking concepts and protocols (Fibre Channel, 10/100/1000 Ethernet, SCSI, SAS and SATA, iSCSI, PCI, PCI-Express) 
• Strong technical leadership, teamwork, communication and presentation skills
• Experience with bench top equipment such as protocol analyzers/exercisers, logic analyzers, high-speed oscilloscopes, and other data storage related test equipment 
• Ability to effectively work with cross-functional teams and across multiple geographical locations
• Functional English language skills
job_lists.other_condition:
Desired Qualifications
• Performance measurement and analysis experience
• Experience with RISC based embedded processors (MIPS preferred) 
• Past work with Unix & Wintel drivers and experience in FW development with light weight embedded kernels (ThreadX, VxWorks, eCos, etc.) 
• Strong debugging skills and experience with kernel (Windbg), JTAG, serial port, and Green Hills Debugger
• Strong system design skills (HW and SW), including C programming, high-speed signal integrity, board design experience, Verilog and VHDL knowledge
• Experience with board-level debug & bring-up
• Experience with high speed debug equipment such as DCAJ and BERT 
• Customer facing experience
• Hardware and chip development/debug skills
• Experience working with Marketing and Sales teams
• Experience in the data storage industry

job_lists.content: Ultimate Computing Solution For Demanding ProfessionalsGetac rugged computing solution business unit provides advanced rugged computing solution to help all the professionals accomplish their missions and surpass their limits. Getac rugged brand is ranked as the world’s second largest fully rugged mobile computing solutions provider.As a BIOS Engineer, you are expected to be responsible for the following：1.UEFI/BIOS coding, porting, debug, problem-solving and maintenance.2.UEFI/BIOS Functions research and development 3.Troubleshoot BIOS related issues per customer request4.Co-work with EE/validation team to narrow down the issue

job_lists.title: Senior Embedded SW Engineer(南港)_IoT
job_lists.company: 神基科技股份有限公司
job_lists.content: At IOT group of Getac, we’ve developed an end-to-end, smart mobile video system solution for law-enforcement market. The solution allows law enforcement related departments to conduct police duties, homeland security by capturing and recording videos as evidence, upload to cloud and be able to efficiently and intelligently manage terabytes of video data and analyze crime data on the back-end. It greatly assists police officers and prosecutors in scientific investigations. In addition, we are planning and developing new IOT solutions for different vertical market applications.As a Senior Embedded SW Engineer You Will•Develop full software life-cycle including specification, design, test and documentation•Develop scripting languages, build systems, and version control systems•Develop IP protocols (RTSP,SIP,SOAP,HTTP) and video/audio streaming experience with web development
job_lists.other_condition: Required Qualifications：•5+ years of practical experience in designing and writing C & C++ multi-thread, and multi-process software for embedded Linux systems.•Experience with open source software.•Excellent interpersonal skills, good team spirit and adaptability.•Good English communication skills, open-minded, proactive and fast learning.•Basic project planning skill.

job_lists.title: Senior IoT SW Solution Architect/Engineer(南港)_IoT
job_lists.company: 神基科技股份有限公司
job_lists.content: At IOT group of Getac, we’ve developed an end-to-end, smart mobile video system solution for law-enforcement market. The solution allows law enforcement related departments to conduct police duties, homeland security by capturing and recording videos as evidence, upload to cloud and be able to efficiently and intelligently manage terabytes of video data and analyze crime data on the back-end. It greatly assists police officers and prosecutors in scientific investigations. In addition, we are planning and developing new IOT solutions for different vertical market applications.As a Senior IoT SW Solution Architect/Engineer You Will be able to develop the following SW/FW:1.Bluetooth Low Energy firmware and BLE wireless protocols2.iOS, Android APP based on BLE and WiFi protocols and hardware3.uP RTOS firmware based on Broadcom/Dialog/Nordic WiFi and BLE silicons4.mesh network protocols based on WiFi and BLE5.Be capable of C/C+ programming and optimization on embedded system
job_lists.other_condition: Required Qualifications：•Familiar with WiFi/BLE protocol/Cloud/Embedded Linux/Firmware frameworks.•Good experience on network protocols, gateway, and router knowledge..•Fast learning on uP/RTOS programming , Open WRT, Web programming, PHP/RoR framework.•Excellent interpersonal skills, good team spirit and adaptability.•Good English communication skills, open-minded, proactive and fast learning.

job_lists.title: Software Engineer – Experience (Cloud)
job_lists.company: 紐加頓國際有限公司
job_lists.content:
您正在尋找舞台嗎？
我們準備了一個世界的舞台，等著您站上去一展長才，展開您一生引以為傲的工作。

在 New Garden，每位夥伴都努力不懈，就為了成就自己心中的大夢想，
期待有夢想的您，一同完成。

我們不斷創造出新的價值，更給努力的同仁超乎想像的放鬆，
累了，到咖啡區倒一杯咖啡，隨時隨地再出發，
睏了，找個舒適的角落，提振精神，
卡住了，跨上平衡車，到附近的河濱公園繞繞，重整思緒，

我們在找想擁有相同生活方式的人，歡迎您的加入！


工作環境
簡約舒適辦公環境
無限自助咖啡供應
歡樂充實工作氣氛
年輕熱血新創團隊


福利與制度
薪酬：到職滿一年、平均年薪14個月以上
保險：勞健保、員工團保
共享：年終尾牙全員共享
分紅：每年公司獲利提撥分享給員工

job_lists.title: DPDK Engineer
job_lists.company: 泰錸科技有限公司
job_lists.content:
Timeline Technologies is looking for engineers who have developed high performance solutions in DPDK ( Data Plane Development Kit ) to join our technology team.  As a key member of the technology team, you will work closely with others developers, researchers, and traders.  Our developers are focused on improving and expanding the capabilities of our low-latency trading system which includes: 

•Trade Engine and Backtesting 
•Exchange Connectivity and Infrastructure 
•Strategy Monitoring and Reporting Tools 
•Compliance and Risk Verification 

Timeline Technologies was founded in 2016 as an quantitative research and technology firm.  We are active in several markets in Asia and are excited to add more technical expertise to our team.  The work will be challenging, fast-paced, and competitive.  Timeline Technologies is a flat organization, where ideas flow freely throughout the firm.  A financial background is not necessary, rather we are looking for self-motivated engineers that have applied new technologies to solving challenging problems.  

What we're looking for

•Experience with DPDK environment to implement low-latency network solutions   
•Deep familiarity with Linux kernel and network protocols L2/L3/L4 - Ethernet/IP/TCP/UDP
•Strong C programming skills
job_lists.other_condition: 未填寫

job_lists.title: Linux /Network Engineer
job_lists.company: 泰錸科技有限公司
job_lists.content:
Timeline Technologies was founded in 2016 as an quantitative research and technology firm.  We are active in several markets in Asia and looking for experienced Linux/Network Engineer to join our technology team.  At Timeline Technologies, our engineers design, build, and improve our core trading system.  As a key member of the technology team, you will collaborate closely with other developers, researchers, and traders.

Our system engineers are focused on improving the performance of our trading system.  Key responsibilities include: 

•Linux kernel tuning to minimize trading system latency  
•Tune network infrastructure to minimize trading system latency 
•Automate processes to monitor system-wide latency and other key performance metrics
•Investigate new products and techniques to improve efficiency and performance 

The work will be challenging, fast-paced, and competitive.  Timeline Technologies is a flat organization, where ideas flow freely throughout the firm.  You will have the opportunity to work with smart people in a dynamic and fast-paced environment.  A financial background is not necessary, rather we are looking for self-motivated engineers that have applied new technologies to solving challenging problems.  This role is based in Taipei, Taiwan.  

What we're looking for

•Deep understanding of the Linux Kernel and Operating System. Capable of rebuilding the kernel.
•Expert knowledge of networking protocols (Ethernet/IP/TCP/UDP)
•Experience tuning Linux kernel (hardware performance policy, process affinity, numa, tuna and schedulers)
•Experience implementing automated hardware and software system performance metrics 
•Strong scripting skills

job_lists.title: Software (SW) System Design Director (DTV / STB)
job_lists.company: 台聯科股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
Job Description: 
We are seeking a Sr Manager or Director of System Engineering to lead our Taiwan System engineering team.  With a comprehensive understanding of the company’s overall business objectives, the successful candidate will manage and direct Taiwan system team.  The role will work with passionate delivery leads, architects, developers, integrators, QA and third parties across the company and focuses on continuously delivering software development and solution to customers.

Responsibilities: 
 To lead Taiwan engineering team to deliver products to meet business objectives in managing feature scope, change requests and defects to align with the product’s release roadmap and the business’s short term/long term objectives. 
 Implement efficient project management and staffing management to achieve on schedule product delivery.
 Attract, select, coach and motivate team to execute a high standard of quality.
 Proactively recommend actions to maintain cost effectiveness and competitiveness.
 Partner with IC hardware , product marketing and sales team on product roadmap and strategy.
 Lead process improvement initiatives and measurements to improve quality and bottom-line profitability.
 Utilize internal and external customer feedback to improve team performance and enhance deliverables.


Requirements:
 The ideal candidate should have 10+ years of professional experience with a proven track record of successful STB /DTV software development
 Solid experience in embedded system SW development and integration , STB driver, middleware and application development.
 Experience in Linux  internal frameworks development for STB
 Demonstrated ability to manage teams of 20+ employees through development processes and lifecycles for large-scale projects.
 Passion for delivering high quality products.
 Driven to achieve a high level of customer/partner satisfaction. 
 Fluent in both Mandarin and English.

job_lists.title: 嵌入系統研發工程師（Embedded System Developer Android Auto / FreeRTOS）
job_lists.company: 群瑜股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
本職務工作內容為車用電子產品：韌體、底層通訊、系統嵌入（Driver Porting、BSP）、核心改寫與User Space / Kernel Space Driver Modification、Bootloader Setup / Modification、HAL - JNI、RTOS開發以及移植。使用ARM M / Cortex A / PowerPC為主。主要以NXP（FREESCAL）I.MX6 / I.MX7 / S32 / PowerPC / Kinetis或TI Jacinto與Renesas R-Car等AP或MCU為主。本職務所開Embedded System根據產品可以分為：

* 韌體工作（FIRMWARE）
負責開發車身電子控制單元：
車身車體控制及微機電系統整合（Body Electronics）
主要工作內容：以8 / 16 / 32 BIT MCU韌體開發為主控制馬達電機、Sensor（包括Camera）類型的產品。分為被動安全：包括POWER SEAT CONTRO UNIT（座椅控制單元）、SUNROOF CONTROL UNIT（天窗控制單元）、WINDOW CONTROL UNIT（邊窗控制單元）、DOOR CONTROL UNIT（車門控制單元）、KEY CONTROL UNIT WITH RKE（SMART KEY）、WIPER CONTROL UNIT（雨刷控制單元）、DASHBOARD（車用儀表系統）與主動安全：動力電源管理系統（POWERTRAIN MANAGEMENT SYSTEM）、防盜系統（ANTI-THEFT SYSTEM）或輔助安全如：LANE DEPARTURE WARNING SYSTEM（道路偏移警示系統）等現代汽車主要常見的Applications。

* 通訊協定（PROTOCOL）
負責開發車內提供多個系統溝通的通訊設備、裝置與界面：V2V ROUTER（VEHICLE TO VEHICLE FOR INTER-VEHICLE COMMUNICATION）使用DEDICATED SHORT-RANGE COMMUNICATION METHOD為主如WI-FI AP、AUTOMOTIVE GSM / 3G / LTE ROUTER（FOR CONNECTED CAR）（車用網路路由器）、GATEWAY CONTROL UNIT（閘道控制器）中個電裝部件的BLUETOOTH PROFILE、WIFI PROTOCOL、CAN BUS、LIN BUS、K-LINE、MediaLB MOST、ETHERNET AVB開發。

目前包括硬體在內將技術研發目標總結為以下產品：
1. ECU（ELECTRIC CONTROL UNIT）
    包括主動安全、被動安全、輔助安全
2. GCU（GATEWAY CONTROL UNIT）
    系統內通訊
3. POWER MANAGEMENT SYSTEM
    電源監控、調節與管理
4. GSM / 3G / LTE ROUTER
    連網
5. IVI In-Vehicle Infotainment 車載資訊系統
6. ADAS包括Surround View以及其他Computer Vision Base Device
7. EVR（Event Data Record）
8. DLP BASE PROJECTIVE HUD WITH VR Functions

職務內容分為：
1. 底層分為：
    1-1 System Bring-Up
    包括Modify Bootloader以及Build Up Filesystem / Memory Handling / OTA
    1-2 Device Driver Modification / Development / Porting
    包括HAL相關工作 / Customize BSP
    Driver記有以下常見的Peripherals
    Bluetooth BLE / Classic包括Profile等工作
    WIF
    Ethernet AVB Using Twisted Pair BroadR-Reach
    Capacitive Touch Panel With Display Control Driver
    USB Host
    RS232
    RS485
    HDMI
    Audio Driver & Codec
    CAN BUS Driver
    LIN BUS Driver

2. Framework
    又分為：
    2-1 Networking / RIL主要工作包括開發Networking Middleware / Daemon / Voice 
          Service供上層使用
    2-2 Multimedia主要工作包括開發Media Framework / Service供上層使用

我們使用以下系統作為開發環境：    
Primary Development Environment：
Ubuntu / Window

Target System：
Android Auto
FreeRTOS / MQX

本工作會使用到以下開放原始碼計劃的相關工具：
Tools & Supported Projects In Adoption
1. OpemEmbedded
2. Yocto Project / Porky & Bitbake
3. GENIVI

在線除錯工具或Download Cable：
Debugger & Probe：
I-Jet
J-LINK
Cyclone Pro
Cyclone Pro Max
General Download Cable
DStream

經常使用的晶片計有：
Processors / MCU / FPGA CPLD / GPU In Adoption
Freescale Kinetis (ARM M0+)
Freescale I.MX 6 Above (ARM Cortex A9)
TI Jacinto (ARM Cortex A15)
Renesas R Car
Broadcom & CSR Bluetooth With WIFI
Broadcom & NXP BroadR-Reach Ethernet PHY
Intersil Video Processor With Display Control Feature & Scaler
Fortmedia Voice Processor（DSP）For Noise Cancellation
如果不直接使用MPU的Touch Interface時
多使用Atmel的Solution

以上職務需要俱備有良好的工作能力以及開發產品的熱情。歡迎在各領域有不同產品開發經驗的Developer加入。相關領域研究生無經驗亦可。
job_lists.skills: 系統架構規劃、系統維護操作、系統整合分析、韌體工程開發、網路資料傳輸、信號與系統設計、訊號壓縮技術、通訊工程技術開發、通訊技術發展研究、無線通訊技術開發、資料通訊與網路應用、數位通訊技術訊號處理、硬體整合測試、軟體程式設計、結構化程式設計、韌體程式設計、模組化系統設計、設計網路安全系統、撰寫硬體語言程式
job_lists.other_condition: 基於Android的底層工作主要為System Bring Up。工作為Bootloader到Driver Porting與Struct HAL以及Peripheral的Protocols。由於工作細節比較多。具體分工針對職能與技能會在面試時討論再斟酌分配。所列工作內容不代表要求一個人需要完全處理。我們提供的OFFER依然把FIRMWARE / PROTOCOL / SYSTEM BRING UP分開。其中通信協議的部分如Bluetooth / WIFI也會是專人專用。

job_lists.title: Sr. Linux Software Engineer
job_lists.company: Arbour Services Limited.
job_lists.content:
1．職責：
 從事基於Linux操作系統的通訊產品軟件開發
 根據產品需求和相關硬件芯片規格書，設計和編寫嵌入式軟件解決方案。
 負責產品項目的軟件開發，根據進度或任務安排，進行代碼編寫，代碼審核，和硬件一起調試直到產品量產。

2．職位要求：
 5年以上基於Linux操作系統開發經驗
 精通C語言和C++語言軟件開發，有C++ STL或Boost C++庫等開發經驗
 掌握Linux系統下多進程和多線程通訊與同步方式，有豐富的TCP/UDP等網絡編程經驗，並熟悉使用SSL等網絡加密軟件包
 有數據庫編程經驗，MySQL，PostgreSQL, 或Sqlite等
 有使用ProtoBuf等序列化開發庫經驗，有參與實現過任何開放網絡通訊協議者優先
 有過Linux內核裁剪或驅動開發經驗者優先
 有過網關類型產品開發經驗者優先
 最好有基於單片機，MIPS, ARM等嵌入式系統的軟件(Firmware)的開發經驗

job_lists.content: As part of Global Quality team in R&D organization, responsible for ensuring products design and developed for global market meet quality, performance and reliability specifications, developing hardware quality design validation test procedures Responsibilities:• Develop / establish design review and validation test requirement for new products and new features to ensure such are fully tested and assessed before design release.• Provide timely, precise and comprehensive executive summary report update on key issues and test progression & initiate mitigation plans to constantly meet test schedule.• Provide Quality management oversight to the local design organization in day to day operation.• Manage on-site quality team and optimize the use of test equipment and resource. • Conduct design review on key new features and resolutions to key customer complaint or field return to ensure similar problems do not re-occur.• Work closely with design team to interpret and understand product quality specifications and requirements and to devise methodology to validate them, including drawing up and proposing test plans.• Conduct and coordinate suite of product test and phase release review activities (environmental testing, reliability and accelerated life testing) per project plan and standard in accordance to requirement at various milestones in the product development cycle.• Conduct and coordinate product for the purpose of assessment and qualification of product enhancement, product customization due to design changes and/or component changes. • Prepare reports and makes recommendation to the team and management on product design quality related issues.• Develop, identify and set up test suites (including recommendation for equipment needed), procedures and checklists that effectively validate the product quality and reliability goals specified in product requirement document.• Perform reliability prediction and analysis including MTBF calculation.• Analyze test data to determine the existence of quality problems and work with design team to take appropriate corrective actions to improve/correct design.• Conduct design post mortem review and field design quality issues to drive for continuous improvement in design quality.•RF 2G/3G/GPS3GPP certification experience is plusRechargeable battery IEEE 1725/1625No matter notebook or mobile
